title: TECHNICAL WRITING
description: The Technical Writing Course is designed to help technical contributors improve their writing skills in the technical field, including technical communication. The course covers techniques for planning, writing, and editing technical documents and emphasizes identifying the target audience, selecting appropriate document formats, and using visuals and graphics effectively. Participants will learn how to convey complex subject matter clearly and accurately and create informative content that their readers will understand and use.
target_audience: Anyone who writes technical documents
methodology: This is a very practical program with a minimum of theory and a maximum of practice. The teaching philosophy is based on experiential learning and participants are encouraged to use examples from their work. Class sizes are kept small to allow for individual attention and personal coaching of participants. Training is delivered in a highly interactive way through group exercises, discussion and activities creating an environment that facilitates accelerated learning and application
learning_objectives: ["Apply the technical writing process to plan, draft, revise, and edit effective technical documents.", "Identify and tailor content for specific target audiences", "Craft clear and concise technical documents by overcoming common writing challenges", "Structure information logically and visually", "Design the look and feel of technical documents"]
learning_outcomes: ["Demonstrate the ability to plan, draft, revise, and edit technical documents by following the key stages of the technical writing process, ensuring clarity, conciseness, and accuracy.", "Assess and analyze the target audience to effectively tailor content, style, and language, ensuring that technical documents meet the needs and understanding of the intended readers.", "Use visuals and structure effectively: Design and incorporate visuals, graphics, and headings to enhance the readability and comprehension of technical documents, while structuring", "information logically to support user tasks and facilitate skimming.", "Overcome common writing challenges"]

title: EDUCATION TECHNIQUES & SKILLS
description: This one-day training module on Education Techniques and Skills is designed to empower educators with cutting-edge teaching methods and practical skills. Focused on modern educational strategies, it encompasses interactive sessions on innovative teaching techniques, effective use of technology in the classroom, classroom management, and assessment methods. Tailored for teachers and educational professionals, this module offers a blend of theoretical insights and hands-on activities, ensuring participants leave with actionable skills to enhance their teaching effectiveness and student engagement.
learning_objectives: ["To equip educators with contemporary teaching techniques, effective use of technology in education, classroom management strategies, and assessment and feedback methods."]

title: EDUCATION TECHNIQUES & SKILLS

title: Fundamental of Consolidated Account
description: The Fundamental Consolidated Accounting Training Program offers participants a comprehensive introduction to the principles and practices of consolidated financial reporting. This one-day training program is designed to provide a foundational understanding of consolidated accounting concepts, methods, and techniques. Through interactive learning activities and practical examples, participants will gain the knowledge and skills necessary to understand consolidating financial statements effectively.
target_audience: Accounting professionals with limited or no experience in consolidated accounting, finance managers and executives responsible for overseeing the consolidation process, small business owners and entrepreneurs seeking to understand the basics of consolidated financial reporting
methodology: Interactive Lectures: Engaging presentations to introduce consolidated accounting concepts and principles. Case Studies: Real-world scenarios and examples to illustrate consolidation challenges and solutions. Group Discussions: Opportunities for participants to share insights and discuss consolidation issues. Q&A Sessions: Dedicated time for participants to seek clarification and ask questions. Demonstrations: Step-by-step demonstrations of basic consolidation account Assessments: Quizzes and exercises to assess participants' understanding and retention of key concepts.
learning_objectives: ["Understand the concept of consolidated account.", "Identify and analyze the various methods of consolidation.", "Apply consolidation techniques to eliminate intercompany transactions and balances.", "Interpret and prepare basic consolidated financial statements.", "Recognize the significance of minority interest (non-controlling interest) in consolidated reporting.", "Demonstrate proficiency in using basic consolidation tools and software.", "Appreciate the importance of compliance with accounting standards and regulations in consolidated financial reporting"]

title: COST ACCOUNTING TECHNIQUES FOR COSTMONITORING AND CONTROL
Finance Fundamentals for Non-Finance Professionals
description: Finance is the lifeblood of any organization, influencing every aspect of decision-making and strategic planning. However, for professionals without a financial background, navigating the world of finance can be daunting. This intensive two-day course is designed to demystify finance for non-finance professionals, equipping them with essential knowledge and skills to make informed financial decisions and contribute effectively to their organization's success. Participants will learn into the fundamental principles of finance, starting with an overview of financial concepts and their significance in achieving organizational objectives. Through interactive sessions and practical exercises, they will learn how to interpret financial statements, analyse financial data, and apply budgeting and forecasting techniques to support strategic planning and control. The course will also cover essential topics such as capital budgeting, cost management, and risk assessment, providing participants with the tools to evaluate investment opportunities, manage costs effectively, and mitigate financial risks. Furthermore, emphasis will be placed on enhancing communication skills to effectively convey financial information to non-finance stakeholders and foster collaboration across departments.
target_audience: Professionals from non-finance backgrounds seeking to enhance their understanding of finance Managers, team leaders, and decision-makers involved in business planning and strategy Entrepreneurs and small business owners looking to improve their financial management skills
methodology: Interactive lectures with real-life examples and case studies Group discussions and exercises for practical application Hands-on activities to reinforce learning Customized course materials including presentations, handouts, and templates
learning_objectives: ["Gain a comprehensive understanding of financial principles and concepts.", "Develop the skills to interpret and analyse financial statements effectively.", "Learn techniques for budgeting, forecasting, and financial decision-making.", "Acquire knowledge of capital budgeting, cost management, and risk mitigation strategies.", "Enhance communication skills to convey financial information clearly to stakeholders."]

title: E-INVOICING
description: To support the growth of the digital economy, the Government intends to implement e-Invoice in stages in an effort to enhance the efficiency of Malaysias tax administration management. It is in line with the Twelfth Malaysia Plan, where the focus is on strengthening the digital services infrastructure and digitalising the tax administration. The e-Invoice will enable instant or near-instant validation and storage of transactions, catering to Business-to-Business (B2B), Business-to-Consumer (B2C) and Business-to-Government (B2G) transactions
target_audience: Experienced users committed to upgrading their skills in EXCEL especially on creating their own dashboards
methodology: The trainer will incorporate this course through a combination of interactive lectures, case studies, hands-on exercises, and group activities. The participants will be exposed to the real case studies and they will be tasked to solve the class activities. They are encouraged to discuss, engage and apply the concepts learned to a real-world accounting situation. The workshop will also include discussions and feedback session, where participants can express their opinion and also share their past experiences dealing with such issues. It is also helping the participants to explore different perspective from various industries. Training materials will also be provided for their future references and to allow them to keep it handy when they need it in real life situation.
learning_outcomes: ["The simplified e-Invoice concepts by presenting them in a clear and accessible manner for taxpayers to easily understand and implement.", "Step-by-step guidance on key aspects of e-Invoice, including implementation, compliance, and recordkeeping, to ensure taxpayers can follow a", "structured approach in meeting their obligations.", "Practical examples to illustrate real-life scenarios, demonstrating how e-Invoice requirements can be applied in different business contexts.", "Guidance to assist taxpayers in assessing their readiness for e-Invoice implementation and monitor compliance.", "Common questions and concerns that taxpayers may have regarding e-Invoice, offering clear explanations and solutions to common challenges. Additional guidance may", "be issued periodically on certain issues or industry matters. In addition, additional support documentation such as Software Development Kit (SDK), training materials and", "assistance from Inland Revenue Board of Malaysia (IRBM) to further aid stakeholders in understanding and implementing e-Invoice will be made available"]

title: FINANCE FOR NON-FINANCE PROFESSIONALS
description: Finance for Non-Finance Professionals is a specialized training program designed to provide individuals without a financial background with essential financial knowledge and skills. Participants gain a comprehensive understanding of financial statements, budgeting, and forecasting, enabling them to assess a company's or departmental financial health and make informed decisions. The program covers financial analysis, cost management, and capital budgeting, helping executive evaluate project viability and control costs. Participants also learn financial planning and the ethical and legal considerations of finance. Through real-world applications, such as case studies and simulations, non-finance executive build confidence in their financial decision-making abilities, ensuring they can effectively contribute to their organization's financial management and strategic planning. The programme is appropriate for non-financial executive across different industries, both in the public and private sector
target_audience: Executives Management team
methodology: The trainer will incorporate this course through a combination of interactive lectures, case studies, hands-on exercises, simulation and group activities. The participants will be exposed to the real case studies and they will be tasked to solve the class activities. They are encouraged to discuss, engage and apply the concepts learned to a real-world accounting situation. The workshop will also include discussions and feedback session, where participants can express their opinion and also share their past experiences dealing with such issues. It is also helping the participants to explore different perspective from various industries. Training materials will also be provided for their future references and to allow them to keep it handy when they need it in real life situation. Assessment is conducted as a written pre-test and post test ( About 15 20 minutes)
learning_objectives: ["Defining & understanding the finance from business point of view.", "Discuss on how finance is a critical tool to make day to day business decision making.", "Defining & recognizing the 5 elements of accounting (Asset, Liability, Revenue, Expenses, Equity)", "Understanding the accounting equation", "Recognizing and classifying documents and transactions into an appropriate accounting element", "Determining the best investment financing method.", "Identifying & understanding financial statement", "Evaluating the financial performance"]
learning_outcomes: ["Decision making based on financial statement analysis", "Strategizing business based on financial statement analysis", "Understanding capital budgeting", "Making necessary investment decision"]

title: Penyediaan EA Form & Penyerahan E-Filing
description: Kursus ini direka bentuk untuk memberi majikan dan pekerja pemahaman asas mengenai prinsip-prinsip asas penyediaan EA Form, dan penghantaran dalam talian melalui E-Filing, sebagai sebahagian daripada peraturan oleh badan pentadbiran cukai, LHDN. Melalui kuliah, kajian kes, dan latihan praktikal, peserta akan memperoleh pengetahuan dan kemahiran praktikal untuk menyediakan borang EA dengan betul, mengenali individu yang layak dikenakan cukai, julat cukai yang ditetapkan, pelepasan cukai dan rebat serta bagaimana merancang cukai secara terperinci
target_audience: Eksekutif dan Pasukan Pengurusan.
methodology: Jurulatih akan menggabungkan kursus ini melalui gabungan kuliah interaktif, kajian kes, latihan amali, dan aktiviti berkumpulan. Para peserta akan didedahkan kepada kajian kes sebenar dan mereka akan ditugaskan untuk menyelesaikan aktiviti kelas. Mereka digalakkan untuk berbincang, melibatkan diri dan menggunakan konsep yang dipelajari dalam situasi perakaunan dunia sebenar. Bengkel ini juga akan merangkumi sesi perbincangan dan maklum balas, di mana peserta boleh menyatakan pendapat mereka dan juga berkongsi pengalaman lepas mereka menangani isu-isu tersebut. Ia juga membantu para peserta meneroka perspektif yang berbeza daripada pelbagai industri. Bahan latihan juga akan disediakan untuk rujukan masa depan mereka dan untuk membolehkan mereka menyimpannya apabila mereka memerlukannya dalam situasi kehidupan sebenar

title: EMPLOYER OBLIGATIONS IN EMPLOYEES TAX AND INDIVIDUAL INCOME TAX
description: This comprehensive one-day training provides employers, HR professionals, and payroll personnel with a practical understanding of Malaysias individual income tax framework and the employers responsibilities under the law. Participants will first explore the fundamentals of individual taxation, including resident vs. non-resident rules, taxable income categories, benefits-in-kind, and available tax reliefs. The programme then focuses on the employers statutory obligations from onboarding to employee departure covering monthly tax deductions, E-PCB Plus, and administrative compliance under the Malaysian Tax Act. Real-life case studies and interactive discussions ensure participants leave equipped to manage both personal and employer tax duties effectively.
target_audience: HR and Payroll Professionals: o Individuals responsible for managing payroll and tax deductions within their organizations, ensuring compliance with Malaysian tax regulations. Accountants and Tax Advisors: o Professionals who provide tax advisory services and need to stay updated on individual tax laws and employer obligations to assist their clients effectively. Business Owners and Entrepreneurs: o Individuals who manage their businesses and want to understand their tax obligations and how to optimize their tax positions for both themselves and their employees. Individual Tax Payer: o Individuals who want to understand their tax obligations and how to optimize their tax positions for both themselves and their employees.
methodology: Face to face workshop
learning_objectives: ["Understand the Fundamentals of Malaysia Individual Taxation:", "Gain a comprehensive understanding of the Malaysian individual tax system, including tax rates, taxable income, and tax residency criteria.", "Master Tax Reliefs and Incentives:", "Learn about various tax reliefs and incentives available to individuals, and understand how to effectively apply them to minimize tax liability.", "Comprehend Employer Obligations in Employee Taxation:", "Understand the legal obligations of employers regarding employee taxation, including monthly tax deductions, required forms, and procedures for managing foreign employees' tax issues."]

title: FINANCE FOR NON-FINANCE MANAGERS: MASTERING FINANCIAL DECISION-MAKING IN SERVICE OPERATIONS
description: This program is designed to empower non-financial professionals in service-oriented sectors to interpret financial information, perform cost-benefit evaluations, and make data-driven decisions. It bridges the gap between operations and finance by translating financial language into practical tools for service managers and business leaders.

learning_objectives: ["By the end of this training, participants will be able to:", "Understand the role of finance in strategic and operational decisions.", "Interpret financial statements and assess financial health.", "Apply cost behavior analysis, breakeven analysis, and cost-benefit techniques.", "Analyze budgets and financial forecasts for service departments.", "Support investment decisions using financial tools such as ROI and payback period.", "Present financial insights in business cases and recommendations."]
learning_outcomes: ["Use financial terminology and interpret P&L, Balance Sheet, and Cash Flow reports.", "Analyze service costs and break-even points for operational initiatives.", "Conduct cost-benefit analysis in capital and operational decisions.", "Evaluate financial performance using key ratios and variance analysis.", "Contribute meaningfully to budgeting, forecasting, and decision reviews.", "Simulate real-world financial decision-making through an applied case study."]

title: FINANCE FOR NON-FINANCE MANAGERS
description: This 1-day financial management programme is designed specifically for non-finance managers seeking to build strong financial skills and knowledge. Participants will learn how to interpret financial statements, understand key financial concepts, and effectively communicate with finance teams. This course equips managers to make informed financial decisions that improve business performance and support strategic financial planning. Ideal for managers aiming to enhance their financial literacy and confidently contribute to their organisations financial success.

title: SST 2.0 (SERVICE TAX) COURSE OUTLINE
description: This course will provide the participants the technical know-how for the implementing of the Sales & Service Tax 2.0. The course will highlight some of the important contents of the Sales & Service Tax Bill 2018. On 1 March 2024, Malaysia increased its Service Tax rate from 6% to 8%. Nevertheless, certain services continued to be subject to the previous 6% rate. The individual rate for Sales Tax on most goods stays unchanged at 10%. The Royal Malaysian Customs Department (RMCD) has issued guidelines for conventional services for the implementation of a 2% increase in Service Tax, effective from 1 March 2024. On February 14th, it released distinct instructions for digital service providers who are not residents.
target_audience: a) MSME; SME; Importers; Exporters; Services Providers; Manufacturer b) Middle management team c) Office staff d) Supply chain and agencies
learning_outcomes: ["a) Understand SST legislation and requirements", "b) Handle SST matter compliance with the SST requirements", "c) Manage the SST in a proper manner", "d) Charge the SST in according to SST legislation"]

title: ENGINEERING COST REDUCTION
description: The Cost Reduction Training Workshop is a comprehensive two-day program designed to provide participants with the knowledge and practical skills necessary to identify and implement cost reduction strategies within their organizations. Through interactive lectures, case studies, and group activities, participants will learn essential concepts such as cost analysis, lean principles, value stream mapping, and supplier management. By the end of the workshop, participants will be equipped to analyze cost structures, identify opportunities for cost reduction, and implement sustainable cost-saving initiatives
target_audience: Engineering Team
methodology: LECTURE AND ACTIVE LEARNING ACTIVITY
learning_objectives: ["Understand the importance and benefits of cost reduction in organizational success.", "Analyze cost structures and identify key cost drivers impacting overall expenses.", "Apply lean principles and techniques to identify and eliminate waste in processes.", "Utilize value stream mapping to visualize current state processes and identify opportunities for improvement.", "Implement cost reduction techniques such as target costing, activity-based costing, and just-in-time inventory management.", "Develop negotiation strategies for achieving cost reductions with suppliers."]
learning_outcomes: ["Understanding Cost Reduction: Learn why reducing costs is crucial for business success.", "Cost Analysis Skills: Gain the ability to analyze where money is spent in a company and identify areas to save.", "Lean Thinking Application: Discover how to identify and eliminate wasteful practices to save money and improve efficiency.", "Practical Cost-Cutting Techniques: Learn hands-on methods like negotiation with suppliers and process optimization to achieve cost reductions effectively."]

title: EQ Leadership
description: Emotional intelligence is the ability to understand and manage your own emotions and interactions with other people. It is recognized as a key component in effective leadership. Emotionally intelligent leaders practice self-awareness, regulate their emotions and clearly express how theyre feeling to others. They can effectively gauge the needs, wants and expectations of their co-workers and team members
target_audience: Leaders and Managers
methodology: Pre & Post Assessment Lecture & Case Study Games and Video Simulation & Group exercise Discussion & Quiz & Evaluation
learning_objectives: ["development goals and objectives more effectively as a team", "Instil in others an appreciation of the importance of working together", "Generate and maintain enthusiasm, confidence, optimism, cooperation, and trust", "Encourage flexibility in decision-making and change"]

title: EQ & People Skills for Team Leaders
description: Managers and leaders as well as all employees need excellent people management skills so that they can be good leaders. A good understanding of people skills would enable leaders to provide the necessary leadership to enable their teams to give perform well. Participants will develop the ability to effectively apply people skills such as empathy, self-regulation and building bonds to achieve excellence in the workplace. Participants will gain insights into why and how individuals get into conflicts and what can be done to prevent and resolve conflicts effectively. The seminar will enable participants to gain skills and knowledge to apply people skills in the workplace to enhance performance in their work as a leader.
target_audience: This seminar is designed for all professionals who need to have in-depth knowledge of people skills. The seminar would benefit anyone who is interested in developing people skills to be a better leader and manager. It would enable participants to apply knowledge about people skills to improve their leadership abilities.
learning_objectives: ["Insight into people management skills", "Skills in applying principles of motivating people", "Better leadership skills to manage employees", "Competencies in leading employees", "Skills for resolving conflicts", "Abilities to help employees achieve excellent performance", "Interpersonal skills", "Persuasive skills in dealing with others"]

title: EQ and Conflict Management
description: Disagreements can arise in any organization. Having people in the workplace who know how to manage conflict is key to keeping turnover low, productivity high and customers satisfied. Conflict management is used to handle conflicts with fairness and efficiency. In doing so, you can avoid poor communication between colleagues, decrease workplace tension to improve productivity, and also keep the morale of employees high
target_audience: Leaders and Managers
methodology: Pre & Post Assessment Lecture & Case Study Games and Video Simulation & Group exercise Discussion & Presentation Quiz & Evaluation

title: EQ Leadership Security
description: The truth is, the majority of leaders fail to inspire their subordinates to be engaged and productive at work. And they're often frustrated by their inability to incite their team to action. As a leader, embracing the leadership role can be stressful. Convincing your troop to follow you into uncharted territory requires a delicate mix of patience and assertiveness. We endeavor to upskill ourselves and find every opportunity to rise

target_audience: Leaders, Managers, Executive, non executive, supervisors, Team Members who want to improve their ability to recognize, understand, and manage emotions - whether in themselves or others

title: EMOTIONAL FITNESS AND INTELLIGENT ENHANCEMENT SYSTEM
Emotional Intelligence
description: Emotional intelligence is critical to effective many parts of management techniques and tools in the corporate world. By applying self-awareness, empathy, effective communication, and conflict management skills, individuals can manage conflicts effectively, build stronger relationships, and foster a more productive work environment. This training programme is for those who want to ensure efficiency at workplace by implementing the techniques and the the theory of emotional intelligence. Danial Colemans elements are well guided to be implemented in this training for us to have a better awareness on emotional intelligence and a structured approach to manage conflict at workplace. This training also suits for all senior managers and managers and enable them to understand and take up today's management challenges to be more productive in an ever-changing environment

title: OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE OF LIFT AND ESCALATOR SYSTEM
description: This comprehensive three-day workshop is designed to equip participants with the essential knowledge and skills required for effective management and maintenance of lift and escalator systems. The course covers a wide range of topics, from understanding the relevant codes, laws, and regulations, to the intricacies of maintenance contracts and the importance of regular servicing and inspections. Participants will also delve into audit processes, breakdown root cause analysis, and the development of actionable plans to resolve issues efficiently.
methodology: #NAME?

title: FEASIBILITY STUDIES FOR SUCCESSFUL PROPERTY INVESTMENT
description: Making the right property investment requires more than just market intuition it demands careful analysis, sound strategies, and an understanding of both risks and opportunities. The Feasibility Studies for Successful Property Investment program, equips aspiring and active investors with the practical knowledge and tools to evaluate their personal investment profile, analyze market dynamics, and align decisions with long-term financial goals. Through interactive workshops, real case studies, and expert-led sessions, participants will gain insights into legal requirements, cost calculations, location analysis, tenant management, and strategies to maximize both rental yields and capital appreciation. Designed to help investors build confidence and achieve sustainable success in todays evolving property landscape, this two-day classroom program offers a hands-on pathway to smarter, more profitable investment decisions complete with a Certificate of Attendance upon completion.
target_audience: Aspiring and active property investors who want to enhance their decision-making skills and achieve sustainable success in property investment.
methodology: Classroom
learning_outcomes: ["By the end of this program, participants will be able to evaluate their personal investment profile, analyze market dynamics, and make informed property investment decisions that align with their financial goals for sustainable rental income and capital growth."]

title: BUILDING FACILITIES MANAGEMENT, OPERATIONS & MAINTENANCE
description: Building operations and maintenance includes all activities that you need to perform to operate, maintain, and manage your buildings effectively. Traditionally, there exists separation of responsibilities for Property and Facilities Management but with current trends, this line is getting thinner. This course aspires to provide practical knowledge of both Property & Facilities Management for Building Operations practitioners from trainer's 25+ years of experience managing thousands of properties throughout Asia Pacific.

title: Corporate ESG & Sustainability Awareness

title: OPERATIONAL SKILL, SAFETY AND MAINTENANCE OF EXCAVATOR TRAINING COURSE
description: Heavy equipment operators operate excavator to carry out digging purposes as well as various lifting and carrying tasks in various applications during construction and related activities. This heavy equipment is also sometime used to clear brush and stumps prior to logging activities and to build roads at logging and surface quarry/ mining sites. As an operator, they are responsible for preparing their equipment for operation hence conducting pre/ post operational checks at the end of each shift/ daily and its vital. On the other hand, employers must ensure workplaces under their control particularly machineries, tools, plant and equipment must be well maintained and safe without risk and the personnel are trained to use it. Users must be given information, instruction and training as appropriate therefore this one-day training will teach participants on operational skill, maintenance and safety of such equipment.
target_audience: For those who operate and maintain excavator - so each knows what can and should be done on upskill, productivity, maintenance and to protect workers around this equipment. The audience also includes the supervisor, or plant/ operation manager with responsibilities for both a plants operations and its safety.
learning_objectives: ["To ensure digging or trenching can be done safely and profitably for maximum", "equipment uptime, hence the following expectation is required:", "Understand local law requirement regarding excavation & trenching work", "Identify and describe the uses and components of an excavator.", "Identify and describe safety, inspection, and service guidelines associated with an excavator.", "Describe basic start-up and operating procedures for an excavator.", "Understanding the function, systems and components of excavator. machine and other related machine/ equipment", "Improving operational safety of excavator and learn how to apply best methods/ practices or correct operating techniques", "Understanding of excavator machine maintenance operation for maximum equipment uptime.", "Improving performance and productivity while digging trenches is performed"]

title: HR Compliance & Employment Act 1955 (Amendment 2022) Its impact to Organization & HR
description: Employment Act 1955 (the Act) form the basis of employment contract in Malaysia. In 2022, few key amendments were made to the Act in addressing global impact to local employment scenarios. Effective 1 January 2023, all the amendment will take effect. Preparation and communication to key stakeholders is crucial. Hence, HR Practitioners must be well versed with the key amendments, its impact and how to ensure compliance with the Act. This program is designed to share and highlight the areas of concern and how HR Practitioners can proactively seek solution and provide advice to Top Management.
target_audience: Exclusively for Human Resource practitioners
methodology: Presentation Case Study Group Discussion/Activity Policy Drafting
learning_objectives: ["At the end of the session, the participants will be able to:", "Understand Malaysian Legislative framework", "Appreciate the Code of Conduct for Industrial Harmony", "Link the Act with current practices", "Recognize the Act recent amendment", "Prepare action plan to comply with the amendment", "Identify impacted areas", "Propose key changes in Terms and Conditions of Employment"]

title: Competency Based Interviewing Skills for HR and Line Managers
description: The purpose of a job interview is to find out whether there is a good fit of skills, experience and attitude between the interviewee and the organization. This course will provide the interviewer with tips on how to prepare for different type of interview format, what to expect and how to hire the right candidate.
target_audience: Human Resource Executive and Line Manager
methodology: Presentation Skill Practice Video Clips Role Play Case Study
learning_objectives: ["At the end of the session, the participants will be able to:", "Be better prepared for interviews", "Be equipped to ask non-traditional questions", "Practice their skills in a supportive environment", "Improve their candidate s assessment process", "Understand the Do s and Don ts as Interviewer"]

title: TALENT MANAGEMENT AND SUCCESSION PLANNING
description: Many organizations have formal strategies for developing their employees and identifying successors for critical positions. The Best-in-class organizations are those goes beyond the traditional approach and focus on an integrated succession management process which aimed at enhancing leaders current and future capabilities throughout the organization. Therefore, best-in-class succession management involves two key activities: tracking pivotal roles that are emerging as resource pressure points, and proactively sourcing and developing a strong talent pool of future leaders.
target_audience: Head of Department / People Managers
methodology: Presentation Skills Practice Group Discussion
learning_objectives: ["In this program, participant will be guided to apply the tools and techniques in identifying talent pools for critical positions and developing the talent for future leadership roles."]
learning_outcomes: ["At the end of the session, the participants will be able to:", "Understand the Career Management Framework", "Identify critical position within organization", "Select potential successors for critical position", "Create development plans for identified successors", "Monitor successors progress during Succession Management roll out"]

title: TRAINING NEEDS ANALYSIS (TNA)
description: Training Needs Analysis (TNA) is the process of identifying the gap between employee training and needs of training. Training needs analysis is the first stage in the training process and involves a procedure to determine whether training will indeed address the problem which has been identified. Training can be described as the acquisition of skills, concepts or attitudes that result in improved performance within the job environment. Training needs analysis looks at each aspect of an operational domain so that the initial skills, concepts and attitudes of the human elements of a system can be effectively identified and appropriate training can be specified.
target_audience: This course is aimed at anyone who will be conducting TNA in the organization
methodology: Presentation Skills Practice Group Discussion Case Study Simulation
learning_objectives: ["By the end of this course, participants will be able to identify, and analyse training needs and make decisions required for skills development at the organizational, divisional and individual levels."]
learning_outcomes: ["Discuss the value of TNA to the individual, division and organization", "Identify the requirements of the client group", "Apply the strategies for determining training needs", "Make decisions in accordance with TNA information", "Link training needs to the design and development of training courses and program"]

title: ANALYSING DATA WITH POWER BI

The lectures will introduce participants to the various features and functionality of Power BI, while the hands-on exercises will allow participants to apply their knowledge and gain practical experience. The real-world projects will provide participants with an opportunity to apply their skills to a real-life scenario.

title: BASIC OCCUPATIONAL FIRST AID & CPR
description: Accident and Emergencies can happen anywhere and anytime. The likelihood of this happening in the work place increases significantly especially when the work involved in hazardous and dangerous. Loss of productive time, personnel and money is a very well recognized aftermath. Casualties succumb to their injuries before they reach medical facility and the company loses its most skillful, productive hand. Fortunately, this is preventable with proper training. Proper handling of accident victims contributes significantly to the final out for this victim. It is for these reasons we propose the Occupational Emergency First Aid, Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) and Basic Emergency First Response Team Level 3 (BEFRT) program for your organization.
target_audience: The program is open to all and has no entry requirements.
methodology: The program is delivered via lectures, skill and practical sessions with the use of audio visual aids where necessary. Open discussions are encouraged. Lecturers and instructors are fully qualified medical and paramedical professionals fully trained and experienced in emergency rescue.

title: FUNDAMENTALS OF PLAN & BUDGETS FOR MANUFACTURING BUSINESS
description: A manufacturing system must have three basic components: Inputs raw materials or parts that will be used in the manufacturing process. Processes the methods and techniques used to transform the inputs into the desired output. Outputs the products or services that are created as a result of the manufacturing. Budgeting is crucial and essential for manufacturing companies because: Helps in Setting Realistic Goals: Budgeting allows manufacturing companies to set achievable goals based on their financial resources. It helps in setting realistic sales targets, production goals, and cost management objectives. With a budget in place, companies can prioritize their investments and allocate resources accordingly. Enables Efficient Resource Allocation: Manufacturing companies have multiple departments and operations to manage, and each requires a different set of resources. Budgeting helps in identifying the most significant resource needs and allocating them appropriately. It ensures that all departments have the necessary funds to operate effectively, reducing the risk of any financial constraints. Facilitates Timely & Effective Decision-Making: With a budget in place, manufacturing companies can make informed decisions about their expenses. It allows them to evaluate various options and choose the most cost-effective approach. Bottom line is that an effective budgeting would enable companies to track their performance and make necessary timely adjustments to achieve their financial goals, such crucial to ensure sustainability of a business in the longer term.
target_audience: Finance & Non-Finance in Manufacturing Entity
methodology: Methodology: Face to Face Group Activities Presentations
prerequisite: LCD White Boards
learning_objectives: ["Learning Objectives:", "Strategic Insights on Plan & Budget Process, Environment, People, System and", "Communications.", "Capturing Direct, Indirect Costs & Optimising Key Financial Performance Value Drivers", "Working Capital Cash Flows Blind Spots."]
learning_outcomes: ["Learning Outcomes:", "Effective Understanding of Manufacturing Plan & Budget Process.", "Adoption & Implementation of Manufacturing Plan & Budget Activities"]

title: BUSINESS COMMUNICATION AND WRITING SKILLS

title: CONSTRUCTION PROJECT MANAGEMENT
description: PROJECT MANAGEMENT (PM) is functioning like the power system to modern transport for example motorcycle or mechanism system to manual transport like bicycle to produce the deliverable i.e. the product successfully benefiting all stakeholders. Project Management is applicable to any sector of works or industry i.e. Construction, Manufacturing, Transportation, Maintenance, Inspection, Business & Research and/or Development PM model for this course is Project Management Book of Knowledge (PMBOK) 9-Essentials i.e.; Integration Scope Time/Schedule Cost Quality Human Resource (HR)/Manpower Communication Risk Procurement/Supply Chain. PM processes are denoted by IPECC: I (Initiating) > P (Planning) > E (Execution) > C (Control) > C (Closing) + POST MORTEM. The PM project covers all kinds of deliverable required by client i.e. Infrastructures, Buildings, Power/Processing Plants, Facilities like airport & marine jetty etc. PM project comprise of various types i.e. Design Conventional Project, Turnkey Project, EPCC Project etc. along with their project life cycle respectively. For the last few decades, a new project type has been discovered and has been vastly embarked on i.e. Design and Build Fast Track project. All these are improvement and development in the industry which requires advanced PM 9-Essentials understanding.
target_audience: Project Engineer Senior Executive Executive Technician Supervisor
methodology: Exposure and apply the principal of Project Management 9 Essentials i.e. of PMBOK (Project Management Book of Knowledge) of PMIUSA. All 9 Essentials will be covered.
prerequisite: Minimum 1 to 2 years involvement in construction project.
learning_objectives: ["Participants adapted to KSA - Knowledge, Skills and Attitude of PM with motive to", "achieve approval from relevant authority with top priority on Health, Safety &", "Environmental (HSE) + 5S (Sort, Set, Shine, Standard & Sustain) + Security in line with", "nowadays concerns on", "Environmental, Safety & Governance (ESG). Knowledge is the foundation while Skills", "will execute the project efficiently with the right Attitude based on integrity, honesty", "and trust.", "With the completed and approved project, client can use and utilize the deliverable", "beneficially as intended. The approvals required mainly CCC - Certificate of Completion", "& Compliance or other approval certification as per sectors accordingly.", "Adherence and Awareness of PM 9-Essentials by implementing all the 9-Essentials", "effectively with HSE + 5S & ESG (Environmental, Social and Governance) as the center", "core based."]
learning_outcomes: ["Participants able to implement PM for feasibility and viability analysis to determine the", "project whether GO or NO GO as per the technically possible and commercially", "profitable respectively.", "Upon GO above, execute the PM 9-Essentials substantially link to one another as", "designed for best positive results in both the technical as well as commercial aspects."]

title: LAND ADMINISTRATION AND MANAGEMENT IN PENINSULAR MALAYSIA
description: Land administration and management in Peninsular Malaysia is regulated by the National Land Code and the respective State Land Rules. Any individual, organization or Government Agency can apply for state land. When the State Authority approves the application, the land will be alienated and a land title will be issued to the applicant. Usually, the State Government will issue a leasehold title for 60 years or 99 years with or without an express condition imposed. Before a title is issued, the applicant must pay a premium to the State Authority. Disposal of land comes with the right to forfeit land for breach of conditions. The course will examine the topics supported by the statutory provisions and decided case law

title: GROOMING: EMPOWER YOUR IMAGE, BOOST YOUR SALES
description: Nothing succeeds like the appearance, of success, says Christopher Lasch. A professional image is very crucial to create positive impressions reflected in your appearance, behaviour, verbal communication, and body language, whether you are face-to-face in the workplace or in social media. During this program, participants will be facilitated to understand more about ways to enhance their image and personal brand while building a strong reputation based on respect, personal responsibility, and considerate conduct for others. This program is not just aiming for awareness but further, equipped the participants so that they will be able to help others by applying and demonstrate to others.
target_audience: Sales Team (All Women)
methodology: Methodology: Interactive lecture Interactive group discussion Experiential learning activities Group discussion Practical action plans
prerequisite: Need to ask the participants to bring their own make up
learning_objectives: ["Learning Objectives:", "Understand the importance of first impressions and personal branding.", "Analyze body shape, facial features, and color psychology.", "Develop effective styling techniques and color coordination skills.", "Establish a proper skincare routine and apply professional makeup techniques.", "Create a cohesive and professional image."]
learning_outcomes: ["Learning Outcomes:", "At the end of the training program, participants will be able to:", "Apply styling techniques to enhance appearance based on body and facial features.", "Build convincing images with matching guides, clothing selection, patterns, colours, and accessories.", "Develop a personalized skincare routine and apply professional makeup techniques."]

title: E-PEROLEHAN
description: Kursus latihan sistem e-Perolehan ini akan berlangsung selama dua hari dan bertujuan untuk memberi pendedahan menyeluruh mengenai penggunaan sistem e-Perolehan dalam proses perolehan kerajaan. Pada hari pertama, peserta akan didedahkan dengan pengenalan kepada kursus, serta gambaran keseluruhan sistem e-Perolehan. Aktiviti hari pertama termasuk penerangan mengenai e-Perolehan dan e-Katalog, cara menggunakan e-Katalog, serta proses sebutharga terus. Latihan praktikal akan memberi peluang kepada peserta untuk berlatih menggunakan e-Katalog dan mengisi sebutharga terus. Fokus utama untuk hari kedua kursus adalah kepada tender dalam e-Perolehan, diikuti dengan latihan mengisi maklumat spesifikasi dan kewangan dalam sistem e-Perolehan. Kursus ini akan diakhiri dengan sesi praktikal menghantar tender dan pengisian maklumat spesifikasi serta kewangan. Latihan ini bertujuan untuk memperkukuhkan kemahiran peserta dalam menggunakan sistem e-Perolehan secara berkesan.
target_audience: Peserta Sasaran: Kursus ini direka untuk memenuhi keperluan individu yang terlibat dalam atau memantau proses perolehan dan tender sepert: Kakitangan Jabatan Perolehan Pengurus Kewangan dan Belanjawan Pekerja dari Bahagian Perolehan dan Pembelian Pengurus Projek dan Penasihat
methodology: Kaedah Pengajaran: Kelas Sesi praktikal
learning_objectives: ["Objektif pembelajaran:", "Memahami Konsep dan Kepentingan ePerolehan: Peserta akan mempelajari asas-asas sistem ePerolehan, termasuk apa itu ePerolehan, peranannya dalam proses perolehan kerajaan, dan kepentingannya dalam memastikan ketelusan dan kecekapan.", "Menguasai Penggunaan eKatalog: Peserta akan diajar cara mengakses dan menggunakan eKatalog untuk mencari produk dan perkhidmatan, serta langkah-langkah untuk membuat pesanan melalui eKatalog dengan berkesan.", "Memahami Proses dan Teknik Sebutharga Terus: Peserta akan mempelajari perbezaan antara sebutharga terus dan kaedah perolehan lain, serta cara mengisi dan menghantar borang sebutharga terus dalam sistem ePerolehan.", "Menguasai Pengisian Tender, Spesifikasi, dan Maklumat Kewangan"]
learning_outcomes: ["Hasil Pembelajaran:", "Pengetahuan mendalam tentang ePerolehan", "Kemahiran dalam menggunakan eKatalog", "Penguasaan dalam proses sebutharga terus", "Kemahiran dalam Mengisi Tender, Spesifikasi, dan Maklumat Kewangan: Peserta akan dapat menyediakan dan menghantar tender, mengisi maklumat spesifikasi produk/perkhidmatan dengan tepat, serta mengurus maklumat kewangan dalam sistem ePerolehan secara efisien."]

title: COFFEE BREWING AND BARISTA
description: This comprehensive course has been designed to deepen participants' understanding and enhance their skills in coffee brewing and barista. The fundamentals of espresso, including its extraction and brewing process, will be explored, and essential techniques such as brew ratio calculation and espresso recipe formulation will be examined. The nuances of espresso preparation will also be addressed, including grinder calibration and the critical skills of dosing, distribution, and tamping. This course covers the components and construction of various espresso drinks and the precise preparation of multiple beverages. Furthermore, the science of milk will be covered ranging from freshness and steaming techniques to foam quality and the use of milk substitutes. By the end of this training, participants will have acquired expertise in brewing and serving exceptional coffee beverages, equipping them to impress any coffee enthusiast.
target_audience: Target Audience: Aspiring baristas Current baristas Coffee shop owners Caf managers Coffee enthusiasts and hobbyists
methodology: Methodology: Lecture and practical session
learning_objectives: ["Learning Objectives:", "Master Espresso Techniques", "Enhance Beverage Preparation Skills", "Perfect Milk Steaming and Frothing", "Optimize Workflow Efficiency"]
learning_outcomes: ["Learning Outcomes:", "Gain ability to consistently produce high-quality espresso shots by applying precise techniques", "Demonstrate the ability to create and assemble a variety of espresso-based beverages", "Skilled Milk Handling"]

title: NURSING MANAGEMENT & LEADERSHIP
description: This comprehensive training programme is designed to develop essential leadership and management skills for nurses, helping to improve both patient care outcomes and team dynamics. The course includes engaging sessions that address key aspects of nursing management, leadership, and effective decision-making in a healthcare setting.
target_audience: Staff in healthcare
methodology: Classroom
learning_objectives: ["Understanding the role of a nurse manager", "Understanding the nursing organisational structure and their relationship"]
learning_outcomes: ["Upon completion of this training programme, participants will be able to:", "Demonstrate Effective Communication Skills", "Apply Evidence-Based Decision-Making", "Understand Legal and Ethical Responsibilities", "Enhance Leadership and Team Management Skills"]

title: German Culture Integration Workshop
description: This German Culture Integration Workshop is designed to prepare a group of delegates for their professional exchange in Germany. The purpose of this training is to equip them with essential insights and skills to navigate the cultural nuances they'll encounter during their stay. By understanding and embracing these cultural differences, they will be better prepared to integrate smoothly into both the professional and personal aspects of the German environment. This workshop emphasizes that cultural differences are not barriers but opportunities for richer and more productive interactions, setting the stage for effective collaboration and mutual respect.
learning_outcomes: ["By the end of this 1-Day workshop, participants will:", "Gain Key Cultural Insights: Discover essential cultural values, social norms, and business etiquette that are prominent in German society and impact professional interactions.", "Enhance Communication Skills: Develop strategies to bridge cultural gaps and communicate more effectively in a German working environment.", "Apply Practical Integration Skills: Practice navigating common social and professional scenarios, equipping participants with the tools to interact confidently and appropriately in Germany.", "Build Cultural Adaptability: Strengthen adaptability by applying cultural intelligence, allowing for flexible and respectful engagement with German counterparts."]

title: MICROSOFT PROJECT
description: This two-day course, "Mastering Project Management with Microsoft Project," is designed for individuals with a foundational understanding of project management concepts who are responsible for creating and maintaining project plans. Participants will gain hands-on experience with Microsoft Project Professional, learning to navigate the software, define and organize projects, manage resources, and finalize plans. The course covers essential project management practices through interactive sessions, guiding participants from initial project setup to execution and reporting. By the end of the course, participants will have the skills and confidence to manage projects efficiently and create insightful reports for stakeholders. This training equips participants with the necessary tools to succeed in their project management endeavours.
target_audience: This course is designed for a person with an understanding of project management concepts and who is responsible for creating and maintaining project plans. The course will give the student a fundamental understanding of Microsoft Project necessary to create, save project plans and create report.
methodology: Classroom
prerequisite: Basic project management knowledge and skills Competency in using other Microsoft Office applications
learning_objectives: ["Understand Project Management Concepts", "Create a Project Plan", "Organize Tasks and Resources", "Optimize and Finalize Project Plans", "Monitor and Report Progress"]
learning_outcomes: ["In this course, participants will learn to create and engage in basic management of a project using", "Microsoft Project Professional. Participants will:", "Identify project management concepts and navigate the Project environment.", "Create and define a new project plan.", "Create and organize tasks.", "Manage resources in a project plan.", "Finalize a project plan"]

title: IMPACTFUL PRESENTATION USING MICROSOFT POWER POINT
description: Want to create effective PowerPoint presentations but dont know where to start? Whether you are new to PowerPoint or have some experience and want to improve your skills, this course has something for everyone, covering, intermediate and advanced lessons in PowerPoint.
target_audience: This course is designed for Clerks, Officers, Executives, Supervisors, Administrators, Managers of all levels; and personnel who already know and understand and want to further enhance their knowledge and practical uses of Microsoft Power Point
methodology: This program will be conducted with interactive lectures, PowerPoint presentation, discussions and practical exercise.
prerequisite: Have attended Microsoft PowerPoint Foundation & Intermediate Level; OR Able to switch between task applications Create and Save Presentation Print a Presentation with Headers and Footers Create different types of Printout Create Graph and Table into a Presentation Create an Organization Chart and SmartArt Navigate within a Presentation
learning_objectives: ["Participants will be trained on intermediate and advanced lessons in Microsoft PowerPoint which", "includes:", "Video Editing", "Creating videos, that includes trimming, editing and bookmarking action points", "Infographics", "The way to deliver content with visuals to highlight your impactful presentation", "Content Design", "Highlight your lengthy sentences into point form with font emphasis", "Images Effects", "Design and styles images for an impactful presentation", "Animation", "Advanced animation using motion paths, delays and sequencing", "Color Theme and Fonts", "Customizing color theme and fonts for consistency without formatting each slide", "Templates", "Move beyond default PowerPoint templates and create impressive presentations using", "customized templates"]
learning_outcomes: ["By the end of this 2-day training course, participants will be able to:", "Design and Format Slides Effectively", "Leverage Advanced PowerPoint Features for Engagement", "Incorporate Infographics and Media", "Master Visual Consistency Across Presentations", "Utilize Advanced Charting and Data Visualization", "Implement Transition and Slide Management Techniques", "Prepare and Deliver an Impactful Presentation", "Optimize Presentation Tools for Professional Results"]

title: MICROSOFT EXCEL BASIC INTERMEDIATE LEVEL
description: Microsoft Excel remains one of the most essential tools for data handling, analysis, and presentation in the workplace. This two-day hands-on training is designed to equip participants with practical Excel skills from basic data entry and formatting to intermediate-level functions, tables, charts, and conditional formatting. Participants will gain a solid understanding of key Excel features available in versions 2019, 2021, and Office 365. Through step-by-step guidance and real-world examples, learners will build confidence in organizing data, performing basic analysis, and presenting information effectively. This course is ideal for anyone seeking to sharpen their Excel proficiency and improve day-to-day productivity.
target_audience: Professionals from any department (HR, Finance, Sales, Operations, etc.) who want to increase their productivity using Excel.
methodology: Classroom
learning_objectives: ["By the end of this course, participants will be able to:", "Navigate Excel confidently and manage workbooks, worksheets, and cell data.", "Apply basic formulas and cell references to perform calculations and manipulate data.", "Format cells, ranges, and worksheets to enhance readability and presentation.", "Use tables, slicers, and conditional formatting for efficient data analysis.", "Sort, filter, and visualize data using charts and the latest Excel tools.", "Work with essential functions including text, logical, statistical, and date/time formulas."]

title: POWER BI ESSENTIAL: TRANSFORM DATA INTO ACTIONABLE INSIGHTS
description: The course covers the core elements needed to get an understanding of what Microsoft Power BI can do. Participants will use Power Query to extract and shape data and then load and build a Power Pivot Model from scratch, write DAX formulas and set up interactive reports. Get more insights from data, whether its stored on computer or the cloud. Learn how to connect to and merge data with Power BI Desktop, the powerful data analysis and visualization software.
target_audience: All Level
prerequisite: Participants must have intermediate to advance knowledge in Excel. Having hands on experience with Pivot tables, functions such as SUMIF, VLOOKUP & IF and Excels commands such as Filtering, Text to Columns and Subtotal.
learning_objectives: ["At The End of The Program, We Expect the Participant To;", "Connect, import, shape, and transform data for Business Intelligence (BI)", "Understand basic DAX functions", "Visualize data and automate refresh of your reports", "Able to analyze and visualize data like a pro.", "Create dashboards based on reports in Power BI desktop and Excel."]

title: WRITE LIKE YOU MEAN IT!
description: This training program aims to equip participants with the essential techniques and best practices for producing well-structured and impactful business documents such as reports or proposals. Through this training, participants will gain hands-on experience in report (or proposal) preparation, learn to tailor content for different audiences, and master key elements such as clarity, coherence and effective writing
target_audience: All level of staff who require training on report writing
methodology: This highly interactive programme employs adult learning techniques which include active learning strategies to facilitate understanding and retention. Participants are expected to gain the learning points through experiential activities, mini-lectures and hands-on activities such as role-plays, games, discussions, video-watching, presentations and simulations (depending on the requirements of the programme). The trainer will draw from the participants experiences to simulate real life situations to enhance the training.
learning_objectives: ["This training is designed to empower participants to write effective reports (or proposals) that meet", "organisational standards, using simple yet impactful writing strategy."]
learning_outcomes: ["To learn the optimal process of planning and writing business documents", "To improve writing skills in business documents.", "To deliver clear writing that conveys the message accurately", "To strategise business messages using the appropriate writing pattern for effectiveness", "To apply basic English language grammar & appropriate sentence structure for business", "documents.", "To use appropriate formatting suitable for business reports (or proposals)."]

title: BERCAKAP DENGAN KEYAKINAN: MENGUASAI SENI KOMUNIKASI
description: Program praktikal ini direka untuk kakitangan yang berminat untuk mengembangkan kemahiran bercakap di hadapan orang ramai dalam persekitaran perniagaan. Ia bertujuan untuk membina tahap keyakinan peserta semasa bercakap di hadapan khalayak dan membimbing mereka dalam menyediakan pelbagai jenis ucapan pada tahap profesional.
target_audience: Program ini sesuai untuk Eksekutif, Ketua Pasukan, Penyelia, Pengurus, dan mereka yang memerlukan kemahiran bercakap di hadapan orang ramai yang cemerlang dalam persekitaran perniagaan.
methodology: Medium Pengajaran: Bahasa Inggeris 60%; Bahasa Melayu 40% Mod Penyampaian: Program yang sangat interaktif ini menggunakan teknik pembelajaran dewasa yang termasuk strategi pembelajaran aktif untuk memudahkan pemahaman dan pengekalan. Peserta dijangka memperoleh Learning Point melalui aktiviti pengalaman, mini-ceramah dan aktiviti praktikal seperti lakonan peranan, permainan, perbincangan, menonton video, pembentangan, dan simulasi. Pengajar akan mengambil pengalaman peserta untuk mensimulasikan situasi kehidupan sebenar bagi meningkatkan latihan.

title: IMPACTFUL PRESENTATION & COMMUNICATION MASTERY
description: This hands-on programme is designed for employees who are interested in developing their presentation skills at the workplace. It aims at providing the participants with the necessary guides for developing a simple, yet highly effective and efficient style of presentation skills, up to a professional level.
target_audience: This program is suitable for Executives, Team Leaders, Supervisors, Managers and those who require outstanding presentation skills at the workplace.
methodology: This highly interactive programme employs adult learning techniques which include active learning strategies to facilitate understanding and retention. Participants are expected to gain the learning points through experiential activities, mini-lectures and hands-on activities such as role-plays, games, discussions, video-watching, presentations and simulations. The trainer will draw from the participants experiences to simulate real life situations to enhance the training.
learning_objectives: ["This course is designed to expose the participants to the effective styles of conducting", "winning business presentations."]
learning_outcomes: ["Upon completion of this program, the participants will be able to:", "overcome nervousness and build confidence during business presentations.", "master the fundamentals of effective communication during business presentations.", "deliver audience-centred presentations like professionals."]

description: In todays global and competitive business environment, the ability to communicate effectively in English Language is critical for professional success. Whether it's writing a concise email, participating in a meeting or delivering a presentation, professionals are expected to convey their ideas clearly, confidently, and appropriately. This 2-day training aims to equip participants with practical tools, language strategies, and interactive activities to build confidence and polish their professional English Language communication skills.
target_audience: This program is suitable for Executives, Team Leaders, Supervisors, Managers and those who would like to improve their professional English language skills at the workplace.

title: LEADERSHIP SKILL FOR OPERATIONAL LEADERS & SUPERVISORS
description: This 2-day training course, led by Roslan Effendi, MBA in International Business and Senior Sales Leader in MNCs, is designed to equip operational leaders and new manager with essential leadership skills. The course covers time management, prioritization, effective problem-solving, and innovation while fostering self- renewal and organizational effectiveness. Participants will engage in interactive activities, role plays, and case studies that apply real-world industry scenarios. By the end of the course, participants will have developed the knowledge and practical skills to enhance their leadership abilities and optimize team performance.
target_audience: All industry, any professional functional area of duty and any country of origin. Target group are from working professional from Executive, Manager, Senior Manager, Top Management level in an organization.
methodology: Participant will be exposed to the skill and knowledge of the Leadership Skill for Operational Leaders & Supervisors using learning elements in this course. All learning elements will be carefully planned so participant will get the opportunity to perform the thought techniques in class through role plays and case studies that relates to each broad industry application and functional area of specialization. All participant will be divided into smaller groups i.e. 3~5 participant per group. Each learning module will be supported by activities i.e. images, demo, example, stories, current issues discussion that relates to the knowledge transfer. At the end of each session, trainer will review the participant understanding through pre and post- test review, Q&A and summarize the session together with participant.
learning_outcomes: ["Participant should be able to master the required knowledge and skill to effectively manage time using the", "Leadership Skill for Operational Leaders & Supervisors as the learning element.", "Managers or sales participant will be guided to the knowledge of how to establish a best framework", "and daily routine", "Participant will be exposed with the necessary mindset and discipline dealing with daily operational", "routine.", "Participant will be guided to best practices required to execute the plan effectively and be able to", "develop good habit focusing on the flow of adding value work as opposed to superfluous work."]

title: STRESS MANAGEMENT FOR IMPACTFUL LEADERS
description: In todays high-stakes corporate environment, executives and managers face intense pressure and responsibility. This 1-day workshop is designed to help them master the art of stress management transforming chronic stress into clarity, happiness, and higher performance. Participants will leave not just with tools, but with a mindset shift that enables resilience and deeper job satisfaction.
target_audience: Corporate executives, middle to senior managers, and team leaders who: - Face high workload demands or decision fatigue Aim to lead with empathy, balance, and e ectiveness Seek to model well-being for their teams
methodology: Interactive lectures and scenario-based discussions Guided relaxation techniques (e.g. breathing, mindfulness) Role-play simulations for workplace challenges Peer coaching and action-planning exercises
learning_objectives: ["Understand the root causes and e ects of workplace stress", "Learn proven stress-reduction techniques tailored to corporate life", "Build emotional resilience and proactive habits", "Promote a stress-free culture and strengthen team morale"]
learning_outcomes: ["Participants will: -", "Recognize their personal stress triggers and management styles", "Apply practical tools to reduce stress and boost productivity", "Improve self-awareness, emotional regulation, and mental clarity", "Commit to strategies that increase happiness at work and beyond"]

title: ORGANIZATIONAL TIME MASTERY & DISCIPLINE FOR PROFESSIONALS
description: In the fast-moving and regulation-intensive world of financial services, time is a strategic asset. This two-day program empowers professionals to take full ownership of their time, sharpen discipline, and align their daily work habits with organizational and compliance demands. Designed specifically for executives and managers, this course combines tactical tools with behavioral transformation to cultivate high-performance routines that deliver results under pressure.
target_audience: Executives & Managers in the Financial Services Industry (Banking, Insurance, Investment, Takaful, Asset Management, etc.)
methodology: Experiential Learning: Case studies from the financial sector Tools Application: Practical templates, apps, and time discipline techniques Gamified Activities: Time race simulations, discipline scoring Peer Sharing: Challenges and tips across teams Reflection-Based Exercises: Self-audit and future planning
learning_objectives: ["Strengthen executives' ability to manage time effectively in compliance-driven", "environments.", "Cultivate discipline and accountability to meet critical timelines and regulatory deadlines.", "Reduce procrastination and distractions during high-stakes or repetitive tasks.", "Equip professionals with tools to balance operational tasks with strategic priorities.", "Foster a culture of proactive planning and execution across departments."]
learning_outcomes: ["Apply practical prioritization frameworks to manage multiple demands.", "Create personal and team-based discipline systems that improve work consistency.", "Use focused work techniques to enhance productivity in pressure situations.", "Develop time-bound routines that balance urgent operational tasks with strategic work.", "Improve communication and coordination for shared timelines across departments."]

title: LEADERSHIP SKILL FOR NEW MANAGER
description: This 2-day training course, led by Roslan Effendi, MBA in International Business and Senior Sales Leader in MNCs, is designed to equip operational leaders and new manager with essential leadership skills. The course covers time management, prioritization, effective problem-solving, and innovation while fostering self-renewal and organizational effectiveness. Participants will engage in interactive activities, role plays, and case studies that apply real-world industry scenarios. By the end of the course, participants will have developed the knowledge and practical skills to enhance their leadership abilities and optimize team performance.
target_audience: All industry, any professional functional area of duty and any country of origin. Target group are from working professional from Executive, Manager, Senior Manager, Top Management level in an organization
methodology: The course will be delivered using a combination of interactive learning methods to ensure practical application and engagement. The methodology includes: Knowledge Transfer: Participants will be introduced to key leadership concepts and skills through structured presentations, case studies, and real-world examples. Group Activities: Participants will be divided into smaller groups to encourage collaboration, discussions, and role plays, allowing them to apply leadership skills in varied scenarios. Hands-On Practice: Through activities like games, simulations, and exercises, participants will practice problem-solving, creative thinking, and communication skills in a controlled environment. Real-Life Applications: Case studies and industry-specific examples will be used to demonstrate how leadership skills can be applied to different sectors and functional areas. Interactive Learning: Q&A sessions, pre and post-tests, and group feedback will facilitate participant understanding and ensure retention of key concepts. Self-Reflection: Participants will engage in self-assessment exercises to identify their strengths and areas for improvement, helping them develop personal leadership habits. Continuous Improvement: The course will emphasize the principle of balanced self-renewal, ensuring that participants leave with actionable strategies for ongoing leadership development.

description: This program will take participants through the methods of Effective Communication, Conflict Resolution & Facilitation Skills at workplace so that they can start applying them, building self- esteem, and gaining confidence to start to improve self-confidence and inspire actions that lead to team success. It provides participants with the skills and knowledge needed to effectively navigate conflicts in the workplace and maintain a positive work environment. description: This 2-day training program aims to empower Heads of Departments (HODs) to become effective, self-regulated leaders who drive team success independently. Participants will learn a balanced mix of transactional and transformational leadership skills.

title: COSTING TECHNIQUES & CONTROL, PRICING DECISIONS, BUDGETING
description: Every companys survival and progress, depends on the basis of proper estimation of its costs and estimation of product or service pricing. Every cost conscious executive, specific project manager, cost estimator, planner or organization is in need of improving their cost estimation success. This seminar endeavors to illustrate and explain how to develop costs and how they can be used not only to estimate the product cost, but also how to use them to determine a competitor's likely bid price. It explores the estimating methods typically used to estimate costs and explains the advantages and disadvantages of each, demonstrate several estimating methods, and includes a cost estimating methodology that participants can tailor to their own organizational needs.
target_audience: Cost and Accounts Executives, Managers, Directors, Planners and Analysts
methodology: Lectures, power-point presentation, case studies, participants interaction
learning_objectives: ["Describe costs by classification;", "Identify appropriate cost elements;", "Explain and understand the role of management accounting within an organization and the importance for the requirement of management decision making information;", "Demonstrate knowledge and application of the principles of management accounting, in planning, monitoring, pricing, and various decision making processes, that are deemed to reduce risk factors related to the organization"]
learning_outcomes: ["Able to classify and describe various types of costs (e.g., fixed, variable, direct, and indirect) within an organization.", "Comprehend the role of management accounting in an organization and its significance in providing relevant information for strategic decision-making.", "Able to assess and mitigate risk factors related to organizational operations through informed management accounting practices."]

title: COMMUNICATION AND INTERPERSONAL SKILLS
description: In one day, we spent most of the time at work accomplishing our task and target. At the same time, we are also dealing with challenging and changed situation. All the above require effective communication and interpersonal skills in managing ourselves and managing others expectation. No matter in the meeting to a group of people, one to one in a discussion, or having a telephone conversation; having the right mindset and attitude towards building good rapport in communication is important.
target_audience: Executive
methodology: Group Discussion and Presentation Interactive Session & Role Play Activities Video Learning
learning_objectives: ["Enhance confidence in dealing with people with different personality.", "Establish skills in building rapport to create a win-win situation.", "Understand the correct technique in communication that helps you in negotiation, conflict resolution and more."]
learning_outcomes: ["Define Negotiation: Understand the concept of negotiation and its significance in both personal and professional settings.", "Identify the 4 Stages of a Win-Win Negotiation: Demonstrate knowledge of the four key stages involved in achieving a win-win outcome in negotiations, and apply these stages", "in practical negotiation scenarios.", "Apply the Burger Approach to Feedback: Utilize the Burger Approach to deliver constructive feedback effectively, balancing positive reinforcement with areas for improvement", "in a way that encourages growth and development."]

title: HIGH-IMPACT SALES TECHNIQUES: CLOSING DEALS EFFECTIVELY
description: In todays competitive market, sales professionals in channel and distribution environments must go beyond transactional selling. High-impact consultative selling emphasizes building trust, uncovering real customer needs, and presenting tailored solutions that create long-term business partnerships. This program provides a practical framework through the 5-step consultative selling process, equipping participants to help distributors, resellers, and agents overcome common sales challenges, drive stronger results with end customers, and close deals more effectively. Participants will also learn how to deliver a compelling value proposition, handle objections with confidence, and position products as complete business solutions rather than simple commodities
target_audience: Executive level and above in Selling and Consulting
methodology: On the spot coaching session for immediate feedback and improvement Group Discussion and Presentation Interactive Session & Role Play Activities Video Learning
learning_objectives: ["Equip sales professionals with consultative selling skills to build stronger relationships, understand customer needs, and drive sustainable sales growth in channel and distribution environments.", "Shifting from a push-based approach to a consultative mindset, fostering stronger relationships and sustainable revenue growth in channel sales.", "Practical action plan to implement consultative selling techniques, enhancing the ability to influence decisions and drive mutual success with partners"]

title: THE WINNING WAY IN SELLING: A PRACTICAL APPROACH TOWARDS SOLUTION SELLING
description: In every sales meeting and presentation, we are there to provide the best to our client. Winning a negotiation in getting the client to say YES as an agreement to buy our products and/or services is about achieving a win-win situation in offering the right solution to client. Our action determines our sales success. No matter what are the products you are dealing with, in a negotiation session; it is all about managing client expectation with the right technique in communication, presentation and closing the sales.
target_audience: Executive level and above in Selling and Consulting
methodology: On the spot coaching session for immediate feedback and improvement Group Discussion and Presentation Interactive Session & Role Play Activities Video Learning

learning_outcomes: ["Effectively Handle Objections and Close Sales", "Prepare and Deliver Persuasive Sales Presentations", "Identify and Manage Client Expectations Based on Personality Types", "Use Advanced Negotiation Techniques to Drive Sales Success"]
