learning_objectives: ["Introduce participant to the advanced commands and features of PowerPoint. Create a presentation that includes sound and animation, use various delivery techniques, send it for review and then broadcast it to others."]
learning_outcomes: ["This course is designed for participant who wish to create an affective and successful business presentation."]

title: TRANSFORMATIONAL LEADERSHIP FOR THE DIGITAL ERA
description: This two-day program, Transformational Leadership for the Digital Era: Leading Digitally & Impactfully, is designed to equip leaders with the essential skills and insights to thrive in todays fast-paced, technology-driven world. The course focuses on enhancing self-awareness, understanding various leadership styles, and applying coaching techniques to effectively lead diverse teams. Through interactive sessions and practical tools, participants will learn how to balance work demands with personal well-being while navigating the challenges of digital leadership. This program is ideal for executives and managers looking to lead with purpose and impact in the digital age.
target_audience: Public (Executive&Above)
methodology: This stimulating program will maximize the understanding and learning of concepts through interactive knowledge sharing, practical SOP development, audio visual stimulants, group discussion, article review & selected relevant case studies and experiential learning activities. Adult learning approach according to Bloom Taxonomy level of learners shall be adopted in order to optimize the interactive sessions.
learning_objectives: ["To provide understanding on the importance of strategic leadership based on self-awareness and self-leadership.", "To provide learners the basic understanding on self-leadership & its Adab and how to balance between work requirement and self- need.", "To provide perspectives on leading during digital age with relevant tools.", "To provide over view on the coaching approach as leadership tool and its practical application in managing team of different generations."]
learning_outcomes: ["At the end of this program, learners will be able to:", "Learn and understand the leadership concepts and traits.", "Learn key terms on leadership & followership.", "Understand the different approaches of digital leadership.", "Learn and appreciate the importance of learning the self", "leadership as tools to balance between work needs and self needs.", "Learn and apply the basic coaching technique as tools on oneself and towards helping others.", "Learn the leadership tools and its practical application."]

title: KURSUS GAMIFIKASI DALAM PENYELIAAN PERSONEL
description: Tujuan kursus ini diadakan ialah untuk memberikan pengenalan kepada konsep gamifikasi dalam konteks penyeliaan personel. Didalam kursus ini juga, penekanan akan diberikan kepada kepentingan aplikasi gamifikasi dalam meningkatkan produktiviti dan motivasi personel
target_audience: Penyelia dan pengurus di semua peringkat organisasi. Pegawai sumber manusia yang terlibat dalam pembangunan pasukan. Individu yang berminat untuk meningkatkan prestasi dan motivasi pekerja
methodology: Sesi kuliah interaktif untuk pengenalan konsep gamifikasi. Aktiviti praktikal dan permainan peranan untuk penghayatan konsep. Kajian kes dan perbincangan kumpulan untuk aplikasi praktikal. Penyediaan bahan-bahan pembelajaran digital untuk pembelajaran kendiri
learning_objectives: ["Memahami secara luas konsep penyeliaan dan pentadbiran sesebuah organisasi menjadi semakin kompleks dan berdaya saing berdasarkan prinsip-prinsip yang di ajar", "Membina jalinan komunikasi yang baik berdasarkan elemen yang di ajar dalam slot yang diikuti,", "Menyampaikan tahap komunikasi yang baik dalam melaksakan tugasan", "Memahami konsep dan prinsip asas gamifikasi.", "Menguasai aplikasi gamifikasi dalam penyeliaan personel.", "Meningkatkan kemahiran penyeliaan dan pengurusan melalui pendekatan bermain"]

title: Kursus Kemahiran Komunikasi Berkesan
description: Kursus ini bertujuan untuk memperkukuh kemahiran komunikasi peserta dalam pelbagai konteks. Peserta akan mempelajari teknik-teknik komunikasi yang berkesan untuk meningkatkan hubungan profesional dan peribadi serta meningkatkan produktiviti dan kerjasama dalam organisasi
target_audience: Pemimpin pasukan dan pengurus. Eksekutif dan staf yang ingin meningkatkan kemahiran komunikasi mereka. Individu yang bekerja dalam perkhidmatan pelanggan. Sesiapa sahaja yang berminat untuk memperbaiki kemahiran komunikasi
methodology: Kuliah interaktif. Latihan praktikal. Kajian kes. Perbincangan kumpulan. Aktiviti dan permainan simulasi. Pembentangan dan maklum balas
learning_objectives: ["Memahami prinsip-prinsip asas komunikasi berkesan.", "Meningkatkan kemahiran mendengar secara aktif.", "Menguasai teknik memberi dan menerima maklum balas dengan berkesan.", "Mengendalikan komunikasi dalam situasi yang mencabar atau konflik"]

title: Kursus Kepimpinan Dan Pengurusan Organisasi
description: Kursus ini direka untuk membangunkan kemahiran kepimpinan dan pengurusan dalam konteks organisasi. Peserta akan belajar cara untuk memimpin pasukan dengan berkesan, mengurus sumber dengan cekap, dan mengekalkan motivasi serta produktiviti dalam organisasi
target_audience: Pengurus pertengahan dan atasan. Pemimpin pasukan. Eksekutif yang bercita-cita untuk menjadi pemimpin. Individu yang ingin meningkatkan kemahiran kepimpinan dan pengurusan mereka.
methodology: Kuliah interaktif. Latihan praktikal. Kajian kes. Perbincangan kumpulan. Aktiviti dan permainan simulasi. Pembentangan dan maklum balas
learning_objectives: ["Memahami konsep asas kepimpinan dan pengurusan.", "Membangunkan kemahiran komunikasi dan interpersonal yang efektif.", "Mengaplikasikan teknik-teknik pengurusan projek dan masa.", "Memotivasi dan membimbing pasukan untuk mencapai matlamat organisasi.", "Meningkatkan kemampuan membuat keputusan strategik.", "Mengurus perubahan dan konflik dalam organisasi.", "Membina budaya organisasi yang positif"]

title: Power Packed Presentation Skills
description: This comprehensive training program equips participants with the essential skills to deliver high-impact presentations. It covers a wide range of topics, from overcoming nervousness and avoiding speech crutches to effective delivery techniques, speech organization, and persuasive presentation strategies. Participants will have the opportunity to practice and receive feedback on their presentations, enabling them to immediately apply the learned skills and techniques. The training is designed to be highly interactive, with a combination of lectures, discussions, video analyses, and hands-on practice sessions. It aims to enhance participants' confidence, credibility, and persuasive abilities, enabling them to make a lasting impression and effectively convey their message when presenting.
target_audience: Professionals at all levels seeking to enhance their communication proficiency. Managers, team leaders, and supervisors aiming to improve team collaboration and productivity. Sales and marketing professionals looking to sharpen their persuasive communication skills.
methodology: Interactive Lectures Role-Playing Exercises Group Discussions Individual Feedback Sessions Case Studies Experiential Learning Activities Video Analysis Action Planning
learning_objectives: ["Understand the significance of effective presentation skills in the corporate environment.", "Develop techniques for managing anxiety and eliminating speech.", "Master the elements of dynamic delivery, including body language, vocal variety, and audience engagement.", "Acquire persuasive presentation strategies, including defining problems, selling solutions, and handling objections"]

title: PROFESIONALISME DIRI UNGGUL
description: Kursus Profesionalisme Diri Unggul bertujuan untuk membentuk peserta dengan kemahiran, nilai, dan sikap yang diperlukan untuk menjadi profesional yang cemerlang dalam kerjaya dan kehidupan. Melalui modul-modul berstruktur, peserta akan diperkenalkan dengan aspek-aspek penting profesionalisme dan diberi peluang untuk mengaplikasikan konsep-konsep tersebut dalam konteks kerja sebenar
target_audience: Pekerja dari pelbagai bidang yang ingin meningkatkan kemahiran profesionalisme mereka. Pemimpin dan pengurus yang ingin memperkukuhkan budaya profesional dalam organisasi mereka. Individu yang sedang mencari peningkatan dalam kualiti dan produktiviti kerja mereka
methodology: Ceramah interaktif untuk menerangkan konsep-konsep utama. Aktiviti kumpulan dan perbincangan untuk memperdalam pemahaman. Latihan praktikal dan simulasi untuk menguji kemahiran dan aplikasi konsep. Analisis kes dan contoh sebenar untuk mengilustrasikan aplikasi dalam konteks kerja.
learning_objectives: ["Mengubah tingkah laku negatif penjawat awam kepada yang lebih baik untuk meningkatkan prestasi hasil kerja berkualiti", "Dapat bekerja secara profesional, beretika dan berintegriti dalam satu pasukan berlandaskan nilai-nilai murni yang tinggi", "Melatih penjawat awam menguruskan emosi dan meningkatkan profesionalisme yang lebih unggul", "Memahami pentingnya profesionalisme dalam mencapai kecemerlangan dalam kerjaya.", "Meningkatkan komunikasi dan interpersonal untuk bekerja secara efektif dengan rakan sekerja dan atasan.", "Menguasai etika kerja dan professionalisme sebagai aspek penting dalam kejayaan profesion.", "Meningkatkan pengurusan masa dan produktiviti untuk mencapai matlamat kerja dengan berkesan"]

title: LEADERSHIP SKILLS
description: Everyone wants to be a leader today but being a great leader is not an inborn trait, it is like a skill which you develop over time by focussing on various aspects like communication, proficiency, collaboration, awareness, emotional management, motivation, etc. A good leader in an organisation is always able to extract the best out of employees. He does not only focus on their performance but builds a healthy relationship with them to work on the mutual benefits which eventually helps in the growth of the organisation. This course will help you in understanding the core pillars of leadership and how to impart them in your personality
target_audience: Current leaders Managers Team leaders Supervisors Management Professionals Aspiring leaders
methodology: Interactive Workshops Role-Playing Group Discussion Experiential Learning Video Analysis Case Studies
learning_objectives: ["Enhance participants' understanding of key leadership concepts and styles.", "Develop essential leadership skills such as communication, decision-making, and team building.", "Improve participants' emotional intelligence and ability to lead change and innovation.", "Equip participants with the strategic thinking and planning skills necessary for effective leadership"]
learning_outcomes: ["Participants will be able to apply various leadership styles and theories in their roles.", "Participants will improve their ability to build and lead effective teams.", "Participants will enhance their communication, decision-making, and problem-solving skills.", "Participants will develop greater emotional intelligence and the ability to manage change and foster innovation.", "Participants will acquire strategic leadership skills and be able to create and communicate a clear vision"]

title: Mastering the Art of Presenting
description: "Mastering the Art of Presenting" is a comprehensive 2-day course designed to equip participants with the skills and confidence needed to deliver impactful presentations. Through a combination of interactive workshops, practical exercises, and personalized feedback, participants will learn how to structure engaging presentations, deliver with clarity and confidence, and captivate their audience effectively.
target_audience: Professional who would like to work on their public speaking and presentation skills.
methodology: Interactive Workshops: Engage participants in hands-on activities and group exercises to practice presentation skills and receive immediate feedback. Role-Playing: Simulate presentation scenarios to provide participants with real-world experience and opportunities for skill development. Personalized Coaching: Provide individualized feedback and coaching sessions to address specific areas for improvement and development. Peer Feedback: Encourage peer-to-peer feedback sessions to promote a supportive learning environment and facilitate mutual learning. Video Analysis: Utilize video recordings of presentations to facilitate self-assessment and identify areas for improvement
learning_objectives: ["Develop the ability to identify and understand the needs and expectations of the audience.", "Learn how to structure presentations for maximum clarity and impact, including effective opening and closing techniques.", "Understand the principles of effective slide design and visual communication to enhance audience comprehension.", "Build confidence and develop effective delivery techniques, including body language, vocal modulation, and rehearsal strategies.", "Learn techniques for engaging and maintaining audience interest throughout the presentation.", "Develop skills to confidently handle questions and engage in interactive dialogue with the audience."]

title: SUPPLY CHAIN SECURITY: CTPAT AND TAPA STANDARDS
description: The increase in statistics of loss related to company assets, namely cargo related crimes warrants an immediate methodological approach on how an organization may need to prepare itself with Total Prevention Methodology ensuring it does not fall prey to such losses that may influence Business Continuity. This programme, provides an insight to the organization on the importance of Supply Chain Security, namely the control and management methodologies, which includes a wide spectrum of elements, through a Supply Chain Risk Management Plan.
target_audience: Executive / Managers / Senior Managers / HODs; Security & Loss Prevention Personnel, Logistics and Warehouse Management Personnel, Supply Chain Service Providers
learning_outcomes: ["Upon completing these two (2) days interactive, yet high compliance workshop, participants should be able to:", "Recognise the prevention methodologies based on the Standards of TAPA (Transported Asset Protection Association) &C-TPAT (Customs Trade Partnership Against Terrorism)", "Understand the benefits of implementing Supply Chain Security Risk Management Plan, absorbing the requirements laid out in ISO 28000 (Supply Chain Security Management) &ISO 31000 (Risk Management)", "Identify the change of trend in warehousing, transportation and logistics Security Management", "Identify pro- active approaches Supply Chain Security Management Compliance Programme", "Address the challenges of balancing security needs and economic efficiency", "Developing an effective Risk Management Plan for Supply Chain Security"]

title: TRAINING NEEDS ANALYSIS (TNA)
description: Training Needs Analysis is an invaluable tool that can qualitatively determine the direction of any company. It is particularly useful in addressing skill gaps, increasing productivity & reducing wastage of resources. However, the challenge to gain the management acceptance & approval is very important to ensure a TNAs success. Those charged with carrying out a TNA process must be competent & thorough in their presentation & yet concise in their presentation. The aspect of the ROI & the future benefits that can be derived from TNA must be convincingly presented to the management. The TNA process can be useful in the aspect of the management of the training budgets as it can be seen that the solutions recommended will be able to address any skill gaps that may be present in any organisation. All future trainings are conducted in a more professional manner & not as a fire-fighting approach to show activity. Rather it is a scientifically researched process to minimise loss, reduce rework, financial resources & effectively contribute to the bottom-line deliverables.
target_audience: Any personnel who are involved in analysing, designing, implementing & making decisions about organisational training & developmental plans, including: Training Directors/ Heads Heads of Departments Training Managers Training Executives Training Specialists HR Managers HR Executives Placement Specialists In-House Trainers
methodology: Trainer led discussions, questions & answers sessions The use of music, drawing, colours, images, short videos, short presentations & multi-sensory approach to facilitate the learning process The use of ICE Breakers to gain the perspectives of others Project brief & debrief to gain the insight of others & individual selves Thoroughly researched relevant reference materials, articles & web links for further research & reference Live experience to present papers & cases during the programme. Focussed power networking opportunities
learning_outcomes: ["Understand the use of the TNA as an overall management tool for organisational growth", "Determine which is the best & most effective type of trainings to carry out", "Understand how to maximise the human capital development process", "Address management challenges & be more competitive in the current borderless world of knowledge economy", "Reduce or minimise the effect of staff attrition", "Structure sound & systematic training processes that are justifiable"]

title: PROFESSIONAL BUSINESS COMMUNICATION MASTERY
description: This course is designed to help participants master effective business communication skills in a professional environment. Participants will learn verbal and written communication techniques, interpersonal communication strategies, and how to navigate various business communication scenarios.
target_audience: Corporate Sector Public Sector Finance & Banking Education Retail & Hospitality Healthcare
methodology: This methodology combines interactive lectures, group discussions, practical exercises, case studies, and simulations to ensure participants gain practical skills for effective internal audits.
learning_outcomes: ["Identify key elements of effective business communication.", "Apply professional verbal and written communication techniques.", "Handle challenging communication situations such as conflicts, negotiations, and difficult conversations.", "Utilize communication skills to enhance productivity and workplace relationships."]

title: EFFECTIVE BUSINESS COMMUNICATION AND PRESENTATION SKILLS
description: This course is designed to help participants master effective business communication skills in a professional environment. Participants will learn verbal and written communication techniques, interpersonal communication strategies, and how to navigate various business communication scenarios.
target_audience: Corporate Sector Public Sector Finance & Banking Education Retail & Hospitality Healthcare
methodology: This methodology combines interactive lectures, group discussions, practical exercises, case studies, and simulations to ensure participants gain practical skills for effective internal audits.
learning_outcomes: ["Identify key elements of effective business communication.", "Apply professional verbal and written communication techniques.", "Handle challenging communication situations such as conflicts, negotiations, and difficult conversations.", "Utilize communication skills to enhance productivity and workplace relationships."]

title: MALAYSIAN EMPLOYMENT LAW UPDATES & COMPLIANCE ESSENTIALS
description: The regulatory landscape governing employment practices in Malaysia continues to evolve, driven by social change, technological disruption, and heightened compliance expectations. This two-day training is designed to equip HR professionals and people managers with a comprehensive understanding of the key employment laws shaping workplace practices today including the Employment Act 1955, Sexual Harassment Act 2022, Personal Data Protection Act 2010 (PDPA), and new provisions under the Penal Code such as Section 507A on stalking. Participants will engage in case studies, simulations, and real-world scenarios to build competence in managing legal risks while fostering a safe, respectful, and legally compliant work environment. From handling contract amendments and parental leave obligations to navigating data privacy and anti-harassment investigations, this course emphasizes proactive compliance and practical skills. Whether you're revamping internal policies or responding to complex complaints, the training will help you interpret legal changes, apply best practices, and fulfil your duty of care as an employer under the law.
target_audience: Professionals involved in the human resources and workforce management including: HR Managers and Executives Compliance and Legal Officers Industrial Relations Practitioners People & Culture Leads Department Heads and Line Managers Employee Relations Specialists Risk and Governance Professionals
methodology: Classroom Lectures Structured presentations to introduce legal concepts, updates, and compliance frameworks. Case Study Analysis Review and discussion of real or hypothetical scenarios to reinforce application of laws in practical settings. Interactive Discussions Facilitated conversations to encourage peer learning, experience sharing, and critical thinking. Group Activities & Role Plays Hands-on simulations such as mock tribunal hearings, harassment complaint handling, and policy drafting. Risk Assessment Workshops Guided exercises on data breach response, stalking recognition, and workplace policy audits.
learning_outcomes: ["To provide participants with practical knowledge and legal literacy to interpret, implement, and enforce Malaysia's evolving employment and HR compliance laws, with an emphasis on risk management, workplace safety, employee rights, and organizational accountability."]

title: ESG and Sustainable Finance
description: This comprehensive programme delves into the realms of ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) and sustainable finance. Participants will explore topics ranging from climate risk and the low-carbon economy to sustainable finance strategies. The programme will cover the intricacies of green bonds and financing sustainable projects, socially responsible investing, ESG's impact on corporate governance, and the regulatory frameworks governing ESG. Engaging group discussions and scenarios will provide practical insights, and the programme will conclude with an interactive Q&A session.
target_audience: Senior managers, managers, and executives from all business units
methodology: Interactive group discussions, lectures, exercises, case studies and sharing of real-world experiences
learning_objectives: ["By the end of the programme, participants will be able to:", "Understand the implications of climate risk and the transition to a low-carbon economy", "Formulate effective sustainable finance strategies aligned with organizational goals", "Gain insights into the issuance and financing of green bonds for sustainable projects", "Incorporate socially responsible investing principles into financial decision-making", "Evaluate the impact of ESG considerations on corporate governance", "Navigate the regulatory frameworks governing ESG practices", "Engage in group discussions and scenarios for practical application"]

title: MASTERING THE 6 LEADERSHIP STYLES: KNOWLEDGE AND REAL PRACTICE
description: This training program aims to equip participants with a comprehensive understanding of Daniel Goleman's six leadership styles, enabling them to apply these styles effectively within their organizations. By mastering these styles, leaders can enhance their leadership effectiveness, adapt to various situations, and improve team performance and morale
target_audience: The training is designed for mid to senior-level managers, team leaders, and aspiring leaders who wish to develop their leadership skills and adapt their management style to different contexts
methodology: Presentation Brainstorming Role-play Games/Activities
prerequisite: Participants with minimum 3 years experiences in leader position
learning_objectives: ["Identify and describe Daniel Goleman's six leadership styles.", "Understand the appropriate contexts and situations for applying each leadership style.", "Assess their own dominant leadership style and recognize areas for improvement.", "Develop strategies to incorporate multiple leadership styles into their leadership approach"]
learning_outcomes: ["Participants will have a knowledge and practical skills in applying different leadership based on the goals in daily life and workplace"]

title: BEYOND RENT: EXPLORING LEGAL RESPONSIBILITIES OF LANDLORDS AND TENANTS
description: This course offers a comprehensive examination of tenancy law, focusing on the legal frameworks, rights and responsibilities governing landlord-tenant relationships. Through a blend of theoretical exploration, case studies and practical applications, participants will develop a thorough understanding of the legal principles, statutes and regulations that shape the rental landscape. By the end of this course, participants will emerge with a comprehensive understanding of tenancy law, equipped with the knowledge, skills, and ethical awareness necessary to navigate the complexities of landlord-tenant relationships with confidence and competence.
target_audience: Professionals working in property management, real estate or legal services who seek to deepen their understanding of tenancy law for career advancement or continuing education purposes. Landlords and Property owners Tenants and Prospective Renters Government officials responsible for enforcing housing regulations and policies. Mediators and Arbitrators Educators and Researchers Investors and Financial Advisors General public
methodology: Lectures and presentations Interactive discussions and case studies Group exercises and workshops Participation in class activities Case Studies
learning_objectives: ["Understanding Legal Frameworks", "Exploring Rights and Responsibilities", "Analyzing Lease Agreements", "Navigating Dispute Resolution", "Ensuring Compliance", "Protecting Tenant Rights", "Upholding Landlord Rights", "Promoting Ethical Practices", "Applying Legal Principles", "Facilitating Lifelong Learning"]

title: MASTERING SALE AND PURCHASE AGREEMENTS: ESSENTIAL SKILLS FOR REAL ESTATE PROFESSIONALS
description: Overview of the property market Legal Framework Key stakeholders involve
target_audience: Property Managers Property Owners Bankers Contractors Legal Advisors Lawyers Real Estate Negotiators / Agents Government Ministries and Department Land Administration Managers Property Developers Local Authorities
methodology: Interactive lectures, discussions and practical case studies on all relevant areas to ensure participants grasp clearly issues presented
learning_objectives: ["Understanding the applicable laws governing the Sale and Purchase of property in Malaysia.", "Understanding the importance of the Sale and Purchase Agreement (SPA), the different types of", "SPAs and the key items in an SPA.", "Understanding the steps in the SPA procedure.", "Understanding the required fees in an SPA transactions.", "Understanding what can go wrong in an SPA.", "Cancellation and or termination of an SPA.", "Rights and remedies of parties upon cancellation and or termination of an SPA."]

title: SALES AND MARKETING IN FMCG
description: This 2-day course aims to provide participants with a comprehensive understanding of the sales and marketing strategies in the FMCG industry. The course will cover the fundamentals of FMCG sales and marketing, consumer behavior, digital marketing, and emerging trends. Through interactive sessions, practical exercises, and group discussions, participants will gain the skills and knowledge needed to excel in the dynamic FMCG sector.
target_audience: Sales and marketing professionals in the FMCG industry Managers and team leaders Business development executives Anyone interested in gaining knowledge about FMCG sales and marketing
methodology: Interactive lectures Group activities and discussions Case studies and real-life examples Practical exercises and role-plays Q&A sessions
learning_objectives: ["To understand the FMCG industry landscape and sales fundamentals.", "To learn effective sales techniques and negotiation skills.", "To explore marketing strategies and consumer insights.", "To integrate sales and marketing efforts for better performance.", "To stay updated on emerging trends and challenges in FMCG."]
learning_outcomes: ["Describe the key characteristics and trends of the FMCG industry.", "Implement effective sales strategies and manage customer relationships.", "Develop and execute comprehensive marketing plans.", "Utilize digital marketing channels to enhance brand presence and sales.", "Align sales and marketing functions for improved collaboration and results.", "Address emerging trends and challenges in the FMCG sector"]

title: Mastering Physical Marketing Techniques
description: The "Mastering Physical Marketing Techniques for Manufacturing Sales Teams" course is designed to provide sales professionals in the manufacturing industry with comprehensive insights and practical skills to excel in physical marketing. Over two days, participants will delve into the foundations of physical marketing, explore advanced strategies, and gain hands-on experience through interactive workshops.
target_audience: This course is specifically tailored for sales professionals operating in the manufacturing industry. It caters to individuals who are involved in in-person sales, trade show participation, and overall physical marketing efforts. The content is suitable for both entry-level and experienced sales representatives, as it covers foundational principles as well as advanced strategies to elevate their skills in the dynamic manufacturing sales landscape.
methodology: The course employs a dynamic and interactive approach, combining theoretical knowledge with practical application. Participants will engage in: Lectures and Discussions: Delivered by industry experts, providing insights and best practices. Workshops and Activities: Interactive sessions, including role-playing exercises, booth design projects, and crafting personalized elevator pitches. Case Studies: Analyzing successful physical marketing campaigns within the manufacturing industry. Technology Integration Labs: Hands-on experience with digital tools, augmented reality, and virtual reality applications.
learning_objectives: ["Understanding Physical Marketing: Grasp the principles and significance of physical marketing in the manufacturing sector.", "Enhanced Customer Engagement: Develop skills to engage customers effectively through face-to-face interactions and impactful marketing collaterals.", "Trade Show Mastery: Learn how to maximize opportunities at trade shows, design compelling booths, and execute successful pre, during, and post-event strategies.", "In-Person Sales Excellence: Hone in-person sales techniques, including building rapport, overcoming objections, and closing deals.", "Networking Proficiency: Acquire strategies for effective networking at industry events, crafting elevator pitches, and utilizing networking for lead generation.", "Integration of Technology: Understand how to incorporate digital tools, augmented reality, and virtual reality into physical marketing efforts.", "Data-Driven Optimization: Learn to measure and analyze the success of physical marketing campaigns, identifying key performance indicators and refining strategies based on data insights."]

title: Synergize360 - Mastering Team Collaboration and Communication Excellence
description: This intensive in-house training program is designed to enhance communication skills, establish clear team goals, and foster effective collaboration in problem-solving. Through a dynamic and engaging approach, participants will develop the necessary skills to overcome challenges and work cohesively towards common objectives. The training will be conducted over 3 days and 2 nights, creating an immersive learning experience.
target_audience: This training program is tailored for individuals within the Department HQ with management responsibilities. The target audience includes professionals aged 28-40, primarily of Malay ethnicity. The program aims to address specific challenges faced by the company, making it ideal for those seeking to enhance communication skills, establish clear team goals, and improve collaboration within their management team.
methodology: The training will employ a variety of interactive and experiential methodologies to ensure effective learning: Workshops and Group Discussions: Facilitate discussions on effective communication and goal-setting strategies. Role-Playing and Simulations: Engage participants in real-life scenarios to practice problem-solving and decision-making. Team-Building Activities: Foster camaraderie and collaboration through outdoor and indoor team-building exercises. Case Studies: Analyze real-world examples to draw insights into successful team dynamics and communication practices. Interactive Lectures: Present key concepts and provide theoretical foundations for practical application. Reflection and Feedback Sessions: Allow participants to reflect on their learning and receive constructive feedback.
learning_objectives: ["Enhance Communication Skills:", "Develop effective verbal and non-verbal communication techniques.", "Improve active listening skills for better understanding within the team.", "Define Team Goals:", "Collaboratively set clear and achievable team goals.", "Foster a shared vision and sense of purpose among team members.", "Encourage Team Collaboration in Problem Solving:", "Develop problem-solving skills through interactive exercises.", "Strengthen teamwork by encouraging collective problem-solving approaches."]
learning_outcomes: ["Upon completion of the program, participants are expected to:", "Demonstrate enhanced communication skills in both verbal and non-verbal aspects.", "Clearly define and articulate team goals for improved focus and alignment.", "Collaborate effectively in problem-solving scenarios, fostering a culture of teamwork and innovation."]

title: LEADERSHIP 101: FROM POSITION TOWARDS PRODUCTION LEADER
description: Leadership is a process by which an executive can direct, guide and influence the behaviour and work of others towards accomplishment of specific goals in a given situation. Leadership is the ability of a leader to induce the subordinates to work with confidence and zeal. Leadership is the potential to influence behaviour of others. It is also defined as the capacity to influence a group towards the realization of a goal. Leaders are required to develop future visions, and to motivate the organizational members to want to achieve the visions. Leadership is the ability to persuade others to seek defined objectives enthusiastically. It is the human factor which binds a group together and motivates it towards goals.
target_audience: Executives New Leaders Assistant Managers Managers and above
methodology: Outcome Based Learning (OBL) Experiential Learning Customize Gamification & Case Study Brix4Brains - S.T.E.M Approach Pre-Session Assignment During Session Assignment
learning_objectives: ["Initiate s action - Leader is a person who starts the work by communicating the policies and plans to the subordinates from where the work actually starts.", "Motivation - A leader proves to be playing an incentive role in the concern s working. He motivates the employees with economic and non-economic rewards and thereby gets the work from the subordinates.", "Providing guidance - A leader has to not only supervise but also play a guiding role for the subordinates. Guidance here means instructing the subordinates the way they have to perform their work effectively and efficiently.", "Creating confidence - Confidence is an important factor which can be achieved through expressing the work efforts to the subordinates, explaining them clearly their role and giving them guidelines to achieve the goals effectively. It is also important to hear the employees with regards to their complaints and problems.", "Building morale - Morale denotes willing co-operation of the employees towards their work and getting them into confidence and winning their trust. A leader can be a morale booster by achieving full co-operation so that they perform with best of their abilities as they work to achieve goals.", "Builds work environment - Management is getting things done from people. An efficient work environment helps in sound and stable growth. Therefore, human relations should be kept into mind by a leader. He should have personal contacts with employees and should listen to their problems and solve them. He should treat employees on humanitarian terms.", "Co-ordination - Co-ordination can be achieved through reconciling personal interests with organizational goals. This synchronization can be achieved through proper and effective co-ordination which should be primary motive of a leader."]

title: PENJAJARAN STRATEGIK KEPIMPINAN KE ARAH BUDAYA KERJA BERMARUAH
description: Pernah terfikir bagaimana pemain elit dan organisasi mereka mencapai kecemerlangan yang berterusan? Semakin tinggi, prestasi tahap tinggi bergantung pada pemahaman tentang psikologi kecemerlangan, tidak hanya dalam sukan tetapi di bidang yang beragam seperti seni persembahan, tentera, dan perkhidmatan kecemasan. Program ini akan membantu anda menerapkan prinsip yang sama untuk prestasi elit dalam keselamatan & kesihatan. Natijah daripada apa-apa yang diutarakan, kerja berpasukan sememangnya amalan budaya kerja yang muluk sekiranya dilaksanakan secara berhemah, adil, berbudi bicara serta terbuka minda. Sebaliknya, jika wujud nilai negativiti, waima sekecil mana sekalipun, budaya sedemikian berupa elemen surealistik dalam kerangka pengurusan sesebuah entiti.
target_audience: Pemimpin
methodology: Pengamatan Cone of Learning by Edgar Dale bagi memastikan module dan setiap aktivit yang dirancang adalah khas untuk memenuhi keperluaan Organisasi Action & Output Based Learning (AOBL) Ujian Pemantapan Kendiri NLP & DISC Brainstorming Kumpulan bagi membincangkan case study yang dipilih khusus. Komunikasi 2 Hala Diantara Trainer Dan Peserta Role-play yang intensif
learning_objectives: ["Di akhir kursus ini, peserta akan :-", "Meningkatkan kefahaman dan penghayatan mereka tentang konsep dan kepentingan PEMIMPIN SEBAGAI PENCETUS BUDAYA KERJA BERMARUAH di tempat kerja.", "Menghayati dan berpegang teguh kepada NILAI-NILAI UTAMA yang menjadi asas kekuatan sesebuah Organisasi.", "Membantu pemimpin membuat ANJAKAN PARADIGMA serta menjadi individu yang lebih berfikiran terbuka dan koperatif.", "Meningkatkan TAHAP KEPERCAYAAN dan saling HORMAT MENGHORMATI sesama ahli pasukan dan pemegang tara", "Memantapkan KEMAHIRAN MEMBUAT KEPUTUSAN dan menyelesai masalah secara berpasukan di tempat kerja.", "Membantu meningkatkan MOTIVASI, KEYAKINAN DAN ILTIZAM DIRI dalam melaksanakan tugas-tugas yang diamanahkan."]

title: STRATEGIC DESIGN THINKING TOWARDS PHENOMENAL T.E.A.M
description: What is meant by design thinking? Design thinking is a process for solving problems by prioritizing the organizations & consumer's needs above all else. It relies on observing, with empathy, how people interact with their environments, and employs an iterative, hands-on approach to creating innovative solutions. What is Strategic Design Thinking Towards Phenomenal T.E.A.M? In order to strive and prosper, organizations need to grow and adapt in the never-ending cycle of change. In order to evolve successfully, organizations need a strategy to manage opportunities and risks. Depending on the speed of change, emerging trends, and innovative ideas, senior leaders periodically formulate or refresh the overarching strategic vision and direction for the business. This strategic vision should explain where the organization is going and how it intends to get there while managing the chances that lie ahead on the journey. A strong team is the foundation of a high-performing business and a good team ethic can be held largely accountable for the success and smooth running of the organization. If employees do not gel and work well together, problems can arise, such as poor organization, missed deadlines, and conflict within the workplace. So, what can teams do to ensure that they are collectively productive and drive the company forward? All the activities above aimed at ensuring what the 8 Traits Successful Team Should Possesses. They communicate well with each other They communicate openly with each other, sharing their thoughts, opinions, and ideas with members of their team as well as taking into consideration what others have to say. Communication is essential for keeping track of progress and working together efficiently on tasks. Poor communication can lead to crossed wires, which can mean work is left incomplete/incorrect or conflicts can arise. They focus on goals and results They agree on and set team goals based on outcomes and results, rather than just on the amount of work being done. A clear plan can then be set about how they are going to achieve these objectives, as a group, as well as each individuals contribution. This provides them with clear direction and gives them something to aim for collectively. Everyone contributes their fair share Each member of the team contributes their fair share of the workload and fully understands what their responsibilities are and where they fit in with the running of the business. They feel a sense of belonging to the team, are committed to their work, and really care about the success of the company. They offer each other support Team members are always happy to assist others when they need a helping hand with work. Teams are often more productive when they are also offered support from the organization and access to the required resources. Team members are diverse Everyone is unique and will be able to offer their own experiences and knowledge that others may not possess. Diversity is needed so that all of the required skills are covered by somebody in the team and each individual can be assigned a particular role on the basis of their strengths and skills. A variety of personalities, age groups, cultures, etc. can also bring creativity and a broad range of ideas to the table. Good leadership A strong team usually has a leader that they trust and respect. This individual essentially works as the glue holding the team together and should be responsible for setting the pace, offers encouragement and motivation, and keeps all members of the team updated. Theyre organized The organization is essential for the smooth running of a business. Without it, the workplace can become chaotic and goals are unlikely to be achieved. Though each individual should be responsible for organizing their own workload, management should ensure that everything is running to plan and each member of the team is getting their work completed efficiently. Holding regular meetings can help to make sure that everyone is on the same page and deadlines are being met. They have fun It shouldnt be all work and no play! This can lead to burnout and a lack of productivity, so its important to inject a bit of enjoyment into working life. Teams who work particularly well together enjoy each others company and get together outside of the office from time to time to socialize and have some fun! Building a positive relationship with your colleagues can make for a much more relaxed environment and reduce conflict.
methodology: Knowles theory of andragogy is an attempt to develop a theory specifically for adult learning. Knowles emphasizes that adults are self-directed and expect to take responsibility for decisions. Adult learning programs must accommodate this fundamental aspect. Andragogy makes the following assumptions about the design of learning: (1) Adults need to know why they need to learn something (2) Adults need to learn experientially, (3) Adults approach learning as problem-solving, and (4) Adults learn best when the topic is of immediate value. In practical terms, andragogy means that instruction for adults needs to focus more on the process and less on the content being taught. Strategies such as case studies, role playing, simulations, and self-evaluation are most useful. Instructors adopt a role of facilitator or resource rather than lecturer or grader. Outcome Based Learning (OBL) Related Case Study Brainstorming Related Video Presentation Gamification Experiential Learning
learning_objectives: ["This unique course is specifically designed to ensure:", "Every team member of the Organization comes together with boost up spirit and high morale to perform in any given circumstances", "Avenge challenges in the new norm as a dynamic and unite team", "The ability to let go of the haunted experience cause by the Pandemic and move forward stronger as a person and team player", "Hold tight to the idea and concept of Tanpa Engkau Aku Mati T.E.A.M (Without You I m Dead)", "Understand the importance of moving together away from Reactive Circle towards Proactive Circle to achieve High Productivity Culture", "Each team member aware and realize how the Organization values them as an Asset not liability."]

title: UNDERSTANDING OF FDA 21 CFR PART 820 QUALITY SYSTEM REGULATION
description: Medical device establishments with products intended for use in the United States must register their establishments and list their products with FDA. Understanding US FDA CFR Part 820 can help medical devices establishments meet FDA Guidelines like registration and listing, UDI and GUDID requirements and preparing the Medical Device Master files. This course is designed for ALL functions and levels of an organization who need to gain some basic understanding of the US FDA 21 CFR Part 820 requirements. A value-added course for those working with US regulatory compliance and involved in regulatory inspection.
target_audience: This course is designed for anyone who may involve in the implementation and execution of this Quality System Regulation
methodology: This course can be run in-company around the world We can tailor the content to focus on your requirements. This approach makes perfect sense for groups of 4+ delegates, enhancing cost effectiveness as well as team bonding. Classroom accompanied by Lectures, real Experience Sharing, Role-plays, Interactive Group Activities, Experiences, Simulation Activities and Feedback Delegate manuals and certificates of Attendance will be provided
prerequisite: Knowledge about quality management system for Medical Device Industry (ISO 13485:2016) would be beneficial.
learning_objectives: ["help organizations understand and comply with the Quality System Regulation (QSR) as outlined by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) in 21 CFR Part 820. All relevant employees are aware of and understand the requirements of Part 820 so that the organization can maintain high standards of quality and regulatory compliance.", "Overview of the FDA and intention of the 21 CFR Part 820", "The requirements of 21 CFR Part 820 and other relevant Parts such as Part 11, Part 803 and Part 821", "Working knowledge in application of the requirements", "Preparation and host an FDA inspection"]
learning_outcomes: ["Have a good understanding of involve the expectations of the FDA 21 CFR Part 820", "Assist anyone who may in the implementation and execution of this Quality System Regulation", "To Develop your knowledge of how the requirements of FDA 21 CFR Part 820 are established and help the organization to fulfil the regulatory requirements", "The up-to-date requirements of 21 CFR Part 820 and other Parts such as Part 11, Part 803 and Part 821", "Working knowledge in application of the requirements", "Feel more confident about an FDA inspection", "To Prepare the company to get Medical Device Single Audit Program (MDSAP) certification where it deemed necessary."]

title: PENULISAN SURAT DALAM BAHASA MELAYU
description: Kursus Penulisan ini memberi tumpuan kepada penulisan yang jelas untuk pembaca agar mereka senang memahami mesej yang ingin disampaikan. Program ini akan membantu peserta menulis menggunakan perkataan yang jelas, mengaplikasikan penulisan modul dan menyusun maklumat untuk komunikasi yang cekap dan berkesan.
target_audience: Eksekutif dan pihak pengurusan
methodology: Program ini sangat praktikal dengan minimum teori dan maksimum latihan. Falsafah pengajaran berpaksikan pembelajaran berpengalaman dan peserta digalakkan untuk menggunakan contoh dari kerja mereka. Saiz kelas dikekalkan kecil untuk membolehkan perhatian individu dan pembimbingan peribadi peserta. Latihan disampaikan secara interaktif melalui latihan berkumpulan, perbincangan, dan aktiviti yang mencipta persekitaran yang memudahkan pembelajaran dan aplikasi yang cepat.
learning_objectives: ["Mampu menulis dokumen rasmi dengan tatabahasa dan format yang betul.", "Menghasilkan penulisan yang berstruktur dan meyakinkan.", "Menetapkan struktur, gaya, dan penyampaian yang konsisten"]

title: KURSUS PENULISAN KORPORAT & PROFESIONAL: SURAT RASMI, MINIT MESYUARAT, E-MEL & MEMO
description: Dalam dunia korporat yang semakin kompleks dan dinamik, komunikasi yang efektif memainkan peranan penting dalam memastikan kelancaran operasi dan keberkesanan hubungan kerja. Penulisan Surat Rasmi, Minit Mesyuarat, E-mel dan Memo adalah antara medium komunikasi yang paling kerap digunakan dalam organisasi. Oleh itu, adalah penting bagi setiap kakitangan untuk memiliki kemahiran dalam menulis dokumen-dokumen ini dengan tepat, jelas, dan profesional. Kursus ini direka untuk membantu peserta memahami teknik dan gaya penulisan yang sesuai untuk setiap jenis dokumen serta meningkatkan kecekapan dan profesionalisme dalam komunikasi bertulis.
target_audience: Kursus ini sesuai untuk sesiapa sahaja yang ingin meningkatkan kemahiran mereka dalam menulis surat dengan gaya yang profesional, tatabahasa yang betul & format yang tepat. Kakitangan Kerajaan Pegawai dan kakitangan dalam sektor kerajaan yang sering berurusan dengan surat rasmi, memo atau dokumen komunikasi lain. Pekerja Sektor Swasta & Korporat Profesional dalam sektor swasta, termasuk pengurus, eksekutif, dan kumpulan sokongan yang perlu menulis surat rasmi seperti surat tawaran kerja, surat aduan atau surat rasmi kepada klien. Pelajar dan Graduan Baru Individu yang baru memasuki pasaran kerja dan ingin mempelajari teknik menulis surat rasmi seperti surat permohonan kerja, surat sokongan & surat rayuan. Usahawan dan Pemilik Perniagaan Kecil Pemilik perniagaan yang perlu menulis surat rasmi kepada pelanggan, pembekal atau pihak berkuasa. NGO dan Aktivis Komuniti Organisasi bukan kerajaan dan aktivis yang sering menulis surat permohonan, surat kerjasama, atau surat aduan kepada pihak berkepentingan. Pendidik dan Pentadbir Sekolah Guru, Pensyarah, atau Pentadbir Pendidikan yang perlu menulis surat rasmi untuk tujuan akademik atau pentadbiran. Orang Awam Individu yang ingin memperbaiki kemahiran penulisan surat rasmi untuk keperluan peribadi seperti urusan rasmi dengan jabatan kerajaan atau syarikat.
methodology: Ceramah secara interaktif Latihan praktikal Analisis contoh surat Perbincangan berkumpulan Panduan Langsung (Coaching) Bahan Rujukan dan Nota Bertulis
learning_objectives: ["Penulisan Surat Rasmi", "Meningkatkan kemahiran menulis surat rasmi dengan format yang betul.", "Memastikan bahasa yang digunakan formal, tepat & sopan.", "Mengajar teknik untuk menyampaikan mesej dengan jelas & padat.", "Penulisan Minit Mesyuarat", "Memahami kepentingan & fungsi minit mesyuarat dalam organisasi.", "Memperoleh kemahiran untuk mencatatkan minit mesyuarat secara ringkas & tepat.", "Meningkatkan keupayaan untuk menangkap butiran penting & keputusan mesyuarat.", "Penulisan Emel", "Mengajar teknik menulis emel yang profesional & berkesan.", "Memastikan penggunaan etika emel yang betul.", "Memperbaiki kecekapan dalam menyampaikan mesej dengan jelas & ringkas melalui emel", "Penulisan Memo", "Meningkatkan kemahiran dalam menulis memo yang tepat & informatif.", "Memahami format & struktur memo yang standard.", "Mengajar cara menyampaikan maklumat atau arahan dengan jelas & berkesan."]
